comments: 3 stars because the spins are not giving what is needed for the game. It's a cute game. I enjoy playing with my daughter. However, shields do not spin enough. Sometimes I will go a whole day with no shields and the whole time I'm getting attacked. The other thing is the bonus spin. Never have I won more that 250k coins. I know you want us to pay for another spin but maybe award a higher number once in a while. All in all cute game.

This game was fun initially. But as you rank up, you gain coins and then before you get to even use them, someone is able to steal them from you (by random spinning.. no planned attack!!)   If you play this game,DO NOT SPEND MONEY TO BUY SPINS. People can steal your earnings... so you basically pay actual money, to give others coins...

I need help so I spent $10 in order to get to the next level which I did where I could get my daily spin and hit jackpot and it gave me my fox but I closed the app and it took me backwards to the last level even though I already built in my new level. Please help and put me back to the level ahead of me as this is very upsetting for spending money and being right back where I was before. Fix it and I'll give it 5 stars for everything thank you

I gave 2 star only because when i joined my frnd i did not got any spin..... Though that is shown in my village news...  This is the 2nd time missed the spin.. Do you know it is diffcult to get spin and when you convince a friend to join and you got nothing.....

First everything went okay. But recently I can't download any special event. The game stall when you have  to raid or attack just loading the whole time. Even the spin is now stopping you can press the spin until your blue nothing. Maybe if this is fixed we could try for a higher rating.
I'm  not happy there's no customer service can help to solve the problem. Waiting for the reply but no one care  try to fix this problem before you lost your customer.
description: Join your Facebook friends and millions of players around the world in attacks, spins and raids to build your viking village to the top! Do you have what it takes to be the next Coin Master? Can you travel through time and magical lands to battle it out to be the best Pirate, Hippie, King, Warrior or VIKING of them of all!Spin to earn your lootSpin the wheel to fall on your fortune, be it attack time, loot, shields or raids. Win your loot by landing on coins or gold sacks so you can build strong villages through the game and move up in levels. Win shields to guard your village from other vikings trying to attack you. Become the Coin Master with the strongest village and the most loot!Attack and Raid fellow vikings!Earning coins through the slot machine isn't the only way to get loot, you can steal it too! Attack or raid friend and foe to save enough loot to build your village. No need to break the piggy bank! Fight back and come out victorious against your enemies. Boom! Take revenge on those who have attacked your village and take whats rightfully yours! Bring your Coin Dozer and get rich again! You never know what treasures you can find in someone else's village! Collect all the Cards!It's not always about the loot, it's about the treasure too! Collect cards to complete sets and move on to the next village. With every village you conquer your wins will be greaterPlay with friends!Trade your cards with our online community to collect them all! Join our fast growing interactive Facebook community to meet new viking friends, earn big rewards, and trade treasures! ★ Battle your way to be the next Coin Master with your friends by your side.★ Join in millions of players worldwide!★ Coin Master is free on all devices with in-app purchases.Follow Coin Master on Facebook for exclusive offers and bonuses!Facebook: www.facebook.com/coinmasterAre you having problems? Please contact us in the game by clicking on the menu > Settings > Support or email us at info@moonactive.com
descriptionHTML:
Join your Facebook friends and millions of players around the world in attacks, spins and raids to build your viking village to the top!

Do you have what it takes to be the next Coin Master? Can you travel through time and magical lands to battle it out to be the best Pirate, Hippie, King, Warrior or VIKING of them of all!

Spin to earn your loot
Spin the wheel to fall on your fortune, be it attack time, loot, shields or raids. Win your loot by landing on coins or gold sacks so you can build strong villages through the game and move up in levels. Win shields to guard your village from other vikings trying to attack you. Become the Coin Master with the strongest village and the most loot!

Attack and Raid fellow vikings!
Earning coins through the slot machine isn't the only way to get loot, you can steal it too! Attack or raid friend and foe to save enough loot to build your village. No need to break the piggy bank! Fight back and come out victorious against your enemies. Boom! Take revenge on those who have attacked your village and take whats rightfully yours! Bring your Coin Dozer and get rich again! You never know what treasures you can find in someone else's village!

Collect all the Cards!
It's not always about the loot, it's about the treasure too! Collect cards to complete sets and move on to the next village. With every village you conquer your wins will be greater

Play with friends!
Trade your cards with our online community to collect them all! Join our fast growing interactive Facebook community to meet new viking friends, earn big rewards, and trade treasures!

★ Battle your way to be the next Coin Master with your friends by your side.
★ Join in millions of players worldwide!
★ Coin Master is free on all devices with in-app purchases.

Follow Coin Master on Facebook for exclusive offers and bonuses!

Facebook: www.facebook.com/coinmaster

Are you having problems?
Please contact us in the game by clicking on the menu > Settings > Support or email us at info@moonactive.com

descriptionHTML:
Är du trött på de gammalmodiga gränssnitten för ordsök?
Vill du ha en helt ny upplevelse av ordpusselspel?
★★★ Nu kan du ladda ner Ordet Kors och spela på BRÄDEN helt GRATIS! ★★★

Ordet Kors är ett kreativt korsordsspel som sporrar din passion för hjärnutmaningar. Det har allt som krävs av ett ordsöksspel för att göra det BEROENDEFRAMKALLANDE och UNDERHÅLLANDE.

➤ Ny och fräsch look: Om du gillar att spela brädspel och pusselspel, måste du älska det rena och fräscha användargränssnittet för BRÄDEN du först ser.

➤ Praktiskt och lätt att spela: Du kan lätt dra bokstäver för att bilda ett särskilt gömt ord. Det är enkelt att spela och roligt för alla att bemästra.

➤ Överraskningsbonus: Logga in varje dag och få dagliga bonusar, dessutom får du mynt om du klurar ut Extraorden som inte syns på korsordsbrädet.

➤ Mer än 2 000 spännande utmaningar: Det börjar lätt och blir snabbt mer utmanande. Och du kan pröva gränserna för de ord du kan. Fler nivåer är på gång.

➤ 100 % beroendeframkallande ordspel: Du får aldrig en tråkig stund med detta spelet! Spela detta korsordsspel en gång och du kommer aldrig att kunna släppa det ifrån dig!


☆ HUR MAN SPELAR ☆

- Dra bokstäverna och rada upp ord för att fylla de tomma rutorna vågrätt och lodrätt på brädet
- Tryck på "Blanda" -knappen för att ändra bokstavsordningen
- Tryck på "Tips" -knappen för att få ledtrådar


★ FUNKTIONER ★

• Fint och tydligt BRÄDE för dig (Håll ögonen öppna för anpassningsbara teman)
• Hitta extra ord för att samla mynt
• 2000+ nivåer som du kan spela
• GRATIS att få dagliga bonusmynt
• Passar både barn och vuxna som vill träna ordsökningsförmåga
• Du behöver inte internettåtkomst så du kan ha kul med ordsökningsspelet när som helst
• Enkelt att spela och svårt att mästra
• Helt GRATIS för alla spelare

LADDA NER nu för att börja träna din hjärna och bli en riktig mästare på ordsöksspel på BRÄDEN!

★ KONTAKTA ★
support@boardgame.freshdesk.com
developerAddress: Lockhart Ctr., 301-307 Lockhart Rd., Wan Chai, Hong Kong
recentChanges: - Buggar fixade för att förbättra den övergripande spelupplevelsen
summary: Play addictive and entertaining ordsöksspel at BOARDS!
title: Ordet Kors

comments: On the advert it looks like the best game and I get two disco balls each time and merge them together and you've completed the level. Then you get the game and that rarely even happens! It's only happened once to me and I'm on level 41. Now that's saying something. It gives you a super good promise and nope it's gone out the window as soon as you get the game

I have been playing for a while now, I like almost all of the game, not too impressed that "the piggy bank " is basically held to ransom until you buy it... find another way to entice spending... reduce number of coins won or something but as the levels get hard if you dont spend money you get stuck even with team helps.. it gets disheartening and reduces interest after a while.. to the gamemakers: keep the game playable..the money will come

Although this game is addictive and sometimes fun, it seems the producers of the game are greedily taking advantage of people and getting them to pay money for things not worth it(but they feel the pressure to do so, so they do it). Some things in this game are deliberately set up to make the player fail and become desperate to play on and spend. The Champions League is a poor idea which produces terrible prizes for high ranks, and is just a replay of previous played levels which is a let down.

Update...as I go though the levels Ill get stuck for a day or two...even 3 on a level. Gameplay FUN has Dropped significantly. Moved to 3 stars as a result. If it does not change I'll continue to move to 1 star. Games are many to be played...not just stuck on a level forever!  Other issue with the game is that there's so much clicking and waiting once you win. I wish that it would just go right to the next level and it wouldn't have to wait for the splash screen. I just spend so much time wasted versus playing

It's fast and fun so much better than the other new ones. I love playing it. Thank u so much for all your work and the time spent making it a blast to play.  PS getting past level 80 isn't  possible so I quit. Made me so sad.

Don't waste your time playing this game.  I got too 300 + levels but you get 100 coins for completing each level.  Unfortunately it goes in a piggy bank, which you need to pay to break starting from £1.99, then next piggy bank was £4.99.  It's a con!

comments: I'll get the negative part done 1st. I'd give this 5 stars if there weren't so many ads!!! For the amount of time you actually get a turn, 30 seconds ads in between every turn is a bit much.  Outside of that this is a very fun addictive game.  Note to new players. Although the ball travels better with a perfect hit, there are too many obstacles if you got straight down the middle. Better to hit just left or right of all that.

Needs way more bats i beat this in 3 days and can't get the ball any farther. Add more bats and I'll give 5 stars.  Update: need to make the bats harder to get i already had all the new ones unlocked when i opened the app after the update. Litterally took one swing with the now highest bat and now there is no point to play.  You should make it like 5,000 km for the next update or something.

I think this game is GREAT and pretty fun but there is some things that I don't like about this game for example THERE IS TO MUCH ADS!!!! not just that but also when you do it perfect it goes straight right??? Well hitting perfect actually sucks because if you go to the middle EVERYTHING is in your way I'd rather hit it on the left or right.

Need improvements! First of all, when you will make a perfect hit the chances are 99% that you will hit an obstacle. Secondly, there is no sound.Developers put different sound modes/effects based on the tipe of the bat and some background music! Finally, I think that the game is good and addictive but it needs improvements! 👍⚾️🏏

It's a very simple game, kind of has potential but not a whole lot. There's way too many ads, it feels more like an advertisement trap than a game at times. The ads pop up at inconvenient times and interfere with gameplay. If you have absolutely nothing better to do, then install. If you have literally anything else to do, it's a waste of time

It's fun. But an ad after every attempt is rediculous. I get the developer wants to make money but when you can't play the game without a 30 second ad after every attempt it makes it hard to play. Playing in airplane mode gets rid of the ads and it's fun to play that way. Reduce the number of ads and this game will be better.

comments: I love this game! If you like chess and like to think you'll like this game no doubt! There are some ads but not so much that it makes me want to turn off my Wi-Fi. It has cute graphics and runs smooth. I just cant get enough. As far as scary no not scary a little like whoa they're gunna hit.. Oh wait phew how did they not hit? RGB keep up the good work with this game and all your other free stuff! You guys make great games for all ages!

I love this puzzle game to death. I can literally play it all day and never get tired. Thank you for the challenging ones, it gets my brain going and it makes the game more tense. I certainly am inlove with the music. Please put a soundtrack on youtube, I would love to listen to it !! Thank you creators of the game, I enjoy playing it so much, and I do hope that there's more.

I like it! Certain levels were so challenging to beat in Expert Mode I thought it was impossible. But with some patience you can solve it! (With the exception of Houston U-4 how do you beat that in 46 moves lol)
I don,t have the words to say about the game but only one problem of this game ads always on. The top of the screen

Great game 5/5 levels get more challenging as you go I'm not that far into the game but I hope there will be decorating the trucks at one point and/or those buildings make money as your going threw the levels but still a great puzzling game 😄

This game has alot of benefits, especially, the decision making, plan ahead, multi tasking, pattern recognition and many more. Thank to this game, its very addictive, plain and simple, make you relax and it doesnt stress. Deserve to be 5 star.
description: RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive! You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.This is how you do it:🤔  Draw routes for your truck drivers🎁  Make sure that every house receives the correct package▶️  Press play🚚💨  Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!Features:✓ 400 FREE levels✓ Easy gameplay suitable for all ages✓ Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans✓ Beautiful graphics✓ Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effectsThe game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!★★ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ★★★★ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ★★Available In-App purchases: PREMIUM 💎 KING TRUCK 👑★ The premium version of RGB Express★ Removes ads★ Supports game development and future updatesHINTS 🤯★ The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.Please note:★ Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video★ TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).
descriptionHTML:
RGB Express is a unique and beautiful puzzle game. Simple to play, yet super addictive!

You are running RGB Express, the one and only delivery company specialized in delivering colors.


This is how you do it:

🤔 Draw routes for your truck drivers
🎁 Make sure that every house receives the correct package
▶️ Press play
🚚💨 Sit back and watch while RGB Express delivers!


Features:

✓ 400 FREE levels
✓ Easy gameplay suitable for all ages
✓ Lots of challenges for puzzle game fans
✓ Beautiful graphics
✓ Excellent soundtrack and hilarious sound effects

The game starts off with easy puzzles, which will teach you the many tricks, that help you solve the more difficult ones. There are bridges, buttons, sometimes you must swap cargo from one truck to another.. Eventually you will meet the mysterious white car!


★★ Pocket Gamer GOLD AWARD winner! ★★
★★ Already 7 million players! Thank you all! ★★


Available In-App purchases:

PREMIUM 💎 KING TRUCK 👑
★ The premium version of RGB Express
★ Removes ads
★ Supports game development and future updates

HINTS 🤯
★ The game contains 3 free hints that will help you if you get stuck. If you want to use more hints, you can buy them as in-app purchases.


Please note:
★ Watching bonus videos after completing levels is optional. Press the arrow button to proceed to next level if you don't wish to watch a video
★ TIP: Sign-in to Google Play Games at the main menu to unlock achievements! If you change your phone or tablet, you can then restore your game progress by signing in to Google Play Games before completing any levels. Please note that this only restores the progress based on the achievements (100% completed islands).
developerAddress:
Metsästäjäntie 7
90540 Oulu
Finland

summary: Easy to learn puzzle game with a serious challenge for puzzle game fans!
title: RGB Express

comments: I hope you take the time to read.   This game is amazing, and it just keeps getting better. I do wish you would change the video knives to apples or video. Now I have nothing to spend apples on.  But here is what i really wanted to say i really like this company and the games you put out to your users. I'm newly paralyzed and I been well adapting to my new life and because my hands dont work like they used to these games kept my mind busy and has helped me. I own alot of your games and have spent alot trying to help. I wish I had more to unlock things in time. But Thank you very much.

The game sucks it's alwful. It's gliching non stop for your bad. There are ADS everywhere! Ketchapp you getting worse and worse. There are ads of stupid games everywhere. What a game maker will pay to another game to show them in ADS! That makes the game in the ad even worse. Please ketchapp I was a big fan of you but you made your games so STUPIT. PLEASE FIX YOUR GAMES!

Ads interrupt gameplay and are extremely aggravating. The video that you have to watch to continue your gameplay never works. The game crashes when xp increases. I personally dislike this game, and it would be better if these issues were resolved. Thank you for taking time out of your day to read this review.

I like the game, BUT it is glitchy. Most of the time when I hit "continue" to watch an ad for longer gameplay it freezes, so I have to close the app and start over. When I open the app and start playing the first round, an ad pops up and I inevitably click on it because I'm in the middle of playing the round. Please fix these issues, and I'll try to remember to rate this higher once they're fixed.

Deleted all my data with no reason. Had a bunch of Legendaries and Rares that have now been deleted. I put a lot of time into this game, and even bought the ad-free package. If you don't want a load of wasted time, don't download this app.  Edit- Updated the app and levelled up a bit. The game crashes every time I get a free revive. Still a massive waste of time.

The game was amazing! There was only 1 problem. Sometimes when i  started a game in the middle of it, it would just show an ad and it would make me lose. Unless you fix this my rating will be 4 stars. Fix this and the rate will be 5 stars

comments: I love the game. Been loving it for years. I've been noticing alot lately though that when I watch the ad video to double up on my mystery box, it's not doubling my prize. Getting kinda frustrating and just not worth watch the ads anymore. Can you fix this? If not, I more than likely will delete the app and free up the space.

this game is slightly good but  it is lost its priority to me day by day. initially this game was awesome but now a days it seems to me boring, authority takes this game only for business purpose. after finishing level 30 i lost my patience to this game. it gave more ad. but not increase their game quality. so finally i take decision to uninstall this app to release the space of phone.

Sometimes, the game glitches and it's just very annoying when I have the super boots on and I jump on top of the train and then it glitches and the police catch me!  Apart from that very good game but I think the company just needs to improve the graphics...

I can't even play, cause this is a bad day. And this makes it worse, its like seeing a bad nurse. I don't like it, it works for a bit. I don't like trash games, but it is not my fault I am calling it names. Fix it, or people get this bit. This is what I wrote, now write a note. Write a note about my problem, and stop em.

You think if you have your Facebook added to the game if you get a new smart phone. Your info well transfer over the player you earn. And coins. But the don't so I won't ask my friends to play it till you fix this problem.

I think its a good time killer, but it gets repetitive. They need to add new cities and characters because they did Tokyo already and they brought it back. It also glitches and it feels like every time I lose there is an ad. But other than that, the graphics and gameplay are amazing. Good job, just put in a little more variety.

descriptionHTML:
Enkelt & beroendeframkallande ordspel
Ordmästare är en ny och rolig version av de klassiska ordspelen. Du drar helt enkelt bokstäver för att skapa olika ord. Det är lätt att spela och roligt att mästra. Med detta ordspel kommer du upptäcka hur fantastiskt roligt och beroendeframkallande det är att söka ord.

Mer än 2 000 nivåer
Vårt ordspel börjar med enkla och vardagliga ord, och innehåller tusentals olika nivåer som du kan spela på. Många nya nivåer kommer att uppdateras i framtiden.

Utmanande att hitta alla ord
Är det inte tillräckligt för dig att hitta ord på enkla nivåer? Utmana dig själv att hitta alla extra svåra ord, för att få bonusar. Om du fastnar på vissa ord kan du använda ”Blanda” eller "Tips" för att komma vidare. Du kommer bli överraskad över hur svårt det kan vara att hitta även lätta ord.

Bästa hjärngympan
Ordspel är bäst för hjärnansgympa och stavningsförbättringar. Vårt ordspel är ett av de mest spännande anagram- & ordsökningsspel som utmanar ordsökningsfärdigheter i alla åldrar.


FUNKTIONER
- Dra bokstäverna för att skapa ord
- Hitta extra ord för att samla mynt
- 2000+ nivåer som du kan spela
- GRATIS att få dagliga bonusmynt
- Tryck på "Blanda" -knappen för att ändra bokstavsordningen
- Tryck på "Tips" -knappen för att få ledtrådar
- Passar både barn och vuxna som vill träna ordsökningsförmåga
- Du behöver inte internettåtkomst så du kan ha kul med ordsökningsspelet när som helst
- Enkelt att spela och svårt att mästra
- Helt GRATIS för alla spelare

Om du gillar korsord eller ordsökningsspel borde du definitivt prova det här ordspelet. Det är lättare att lära sig än korsord, och mycket mer beroendeframkallande.


KONTAKTA
support@wordtailorgames.freshdesk.com

descriptionHTML:
SkidStorm is a global multiplayer realtime racing game, free of charge and with simple graphics. You can challenge others online or play alone offline. It offers the smooth control which is really easy to get the hang of! In the game, you may drive the cars and drift though all kinds of tracks, swipe your fingers to experience the thrilling races. You may also fill up nitro tanks to speed up or overtake in the corner to become the champion.

How to play:
- Simply click the button “Left”, “Right” to control where the car goes, and fill up nitro tanks to speed up, and overtake in the corner to win the game.

Feature:
- 24 tracks for you to choose from and enjoy the multiplayer realtime racing to the limit
- 17 different types of cars
- 12 skins to customize your cars as you want
- 5 upgradeable parts: engine, turbo, motor, nitrous and tires
- Form a clan to play with your friends and share the glory
- Leaderboard: win the trophies and get on the top of the chart
- Various game modes: global multiplayer realtime matching mode, single player mode, Career mode, AI mode...
- New content coming soon!

Tips:
- Carefully maintain your drifts to fill up nitro tanks and earn more chances to speed up
- Chicane is the key of how you overtake the others
- Use your nitro wisely: straight paths or the home stretch is the best

The most latest drift racing game made by Cheetah Mobile. Go give it a try!

We’d love to hear your thoughts and suggestions on our game. You are invited to join us to improve it together. More updates and surprises are coming soon. Stay tuned!

E-mail: skidstorm@cmcm.com
FB: @SkidStorm

descriptionHTML:
Catboy, Gekko and Owlette are back in this brand new PJ Masks game app.

Choose your favourite hero character to play with and journey across the moonlit rooftops, and through the night, collecting as many orbs as you can. But beware of those pesky villains, they’re up to mischief again!

FEATURES

Collectable orbs
The hero characters will be able to collect orbs to add to their final score.

Gold Amulets
Each character is able to pick up gold amulets along the way to boost their final score. Make sure to keep your eyes out for them as they’re harder to find!

Character Power-ups
Collect the coloured amulets and trigger the heroes’ super powers:
Catboy – ability to jump higher
Owlette – ability to see hidden orbs
Gekko – ability to smash through obstacles

Hazards
Help the heroes dodgy the obstacles the villains are throwing in their way!

The PJ Masks are on their way, into the night to save the day!

No adverts, no in-app purchases, just lots of action and fun!

Please note: This app is not compatible with some older Android devices

comments: Better game than the other similar. I know the other game was first, but they want you to pay hundreds of dollars upfront so you start at similar pace as this one. Or wait long time, and span of that game is years! Whilst this game is fast to start, cheap, and at free play you can beat it in months, while if you spend a couple of bucks, you can beat it in days, at the most weeks. So basically they sell out this genre for a few bucks, and good riddance! It was fun for a few days, spend few bucks to beat it in few more days, or wait a bit. And thats that. This app is quite addictive and fun! Not to mention how much of a time killer it is! It's cool to see how far you can get, upgrading and collecting money until you can reset for fame! I am having fun with the app so far, but I might get bored of it later. We'll see I guess! :-)

comments: Great game!! The thing I find ANNOYING is that nearly everything costs robux.. Yes, I do have robux right NOW, but for six months I didn't. I think every new account should get 100 robux.. For a cheap shirt, pants, hair and face! (And maybe bloxburg, too)

During my free time, I like to spend time with my sister, she really enjoys this game so I enjoy it too. There are lots of games to choose from so you can never get bored. But I have one suggestion for the mobile version, please add parties, it is super hard to get on the popular games with her that she wants to play.

Wow. What a waste of time and energy. Poorly made, nice idea but poorly done. Game doesnt work, on screen controls dont work on my tablet, bluetooth contoller joysticks work but no buttons work. No options for controller mapping. No real options for anything. My kid loves this game but i beleive it to be an unplayable piece of trash on my tablet. The only thing roblox accomplished was to frustrate and anger me. I do not recommend this game to anyone.

I loved the game but seriously, you need to make the loading faster! I chose to play (for example: Fashion Famous) then I loaded it after 1 hour it doesn't still have loaded. I know tons of people want to play that but why so slow?? :<

LOVE IT!! But the controls for mobiles are... you know "horrible" and the screen are so glitchy and when I jumped or walked its a little late... and all of the famous games, I cant even play it... when I play it, it will load, it will let me play just for a second and then the screen will go freeze, and then BOOM! It will return to roblox home... hopefully the controls for mobiles can be fix and some other stuff that needs to be fix ≈) TY for this wonderful game and I love it!!♥♥♥ (BTW my profile is "cutekittyloverMia25") >.<
I just got the new update and now my mouse wont work plz fix this! :( i realy love playing but its not working so whats the point. (for crombook users) MY ACCOUNT NAME IS IVANA324 no upercase letters

comments: This game cured my depression. It relieved anxiety. It brought America together, blessed the world with a revived Freddie Mercury, saved Cape Town from disaster, sent away a pox, and cured the diseased. If you want a miracle, this game will provide.

Its the most disgusting game i have played in my entire 9 years of living.... crafting and building got deleted but my brother has the last copy of the Game!!! Because it got deleted i was looking for games like CAB (crafting and building) then i came across this... i downloaded the game but it had no sound and the controls were crappy.... like i mean how on earth do you jump in this game!?!??!  If you rated 3-5 star. CHANGE IT TO 1 STAR!!

Stole an old version of MCPE and put a texture pack. Even got the sounds from Minecraft but the gameplay isn't so bad. I managed to survive a night but the most annoying thing is the ads that keep popping in middle of the gameplay. If there was a way to change the texture pack, I would rate 5 stars.

What are the mobs supposed to be. The zombie pig men don't burn in the day and not like Minecraft. It's way off. And I'm a 12 almost 13 year old and Minecraft looks better than this. Who ever made this should, get this game off the play store.
Bad This game keeps getting advertisements and after those, it stops. Please fix this in any way you can.

They basically stole mcpe 0.11.0 (idk) with the plastic texture pack, slapped some other details and put it on the play store XD this is just hilarious, well if you poor and don't have the money to get mcpe full, this app is just for you XD

comments: Excellent fun and a fantastic way to introduce a new audience to some wonderful classical music as well as very talented contempory composers. My one gripe is that recently players have been given multiple oportunities to get 3 crowns or very high scores with ad powered resources. I feel this takes a lot of the challenge from the game. Anyone can get 3 crowns in 4 or 5 goes where us old guard of the game did if in 1 or 2 Still an awesome game though and well worth the download anytime.

This game can fit almost ANY personality type, keeping you entertained for hours!  Don't worry about getting low scores, because the game starts out slow and gets faster, so you'll always be prepared for faster tiles.  There are challenges where you challenge other people in the world!  I never want to give up on this game, its really addicting!

I enjoy this game a lot and always loved how it challenged me. It was also fun when me and my friends would fight to see who's better but I dislike the update where they added boosters, it doesn't seem fair and for me it feel like it loses the title for being relaxing. I don't think that adding those futures was a great idea in my opinion and I really miss the old version a lot.

This game is honestly a great time-killer and even has it's challenging parts, but from what I've noticed as you get to the higher tier songs they just get slower and slower and are just flat with barely any challenge. I expected more of a challenge with a higher level but now this game is getting horribly boring.

I'm in love with this game. It's challenging, you don't have to listen to the music to follow the tiles, and it gives you the feeling to be better. I have a suggestion for a new song you can buy for diamonds. Can you add any song from the My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic TV show? Thanks.

there seems to be a malfunction with sound. I've played several songs and each one has parts where there isn't any music. I'm not sure if this is a bug or just something wrong with my phone. other than that, though, this app is really entertaining.

comments: The game is good, but the multiplayer needs to be fixed.  It hangs on load and results in the player losing money or gems with no recourse.  It randomly drops ships, and when one player immediatlely gets the best ship and the other player doesn't receive any ship until 10 rounds later, it is impossible to catch up.  Fix the multiplayer, then you get your 5 stars.

Definitely not worth it. Was fun at first, but after the updated quests, the game took a serious nosedive in quality. Now you HAVE to beat the opponent in order to get anything, otherwise you're out 1000 gold. Before, you would get something just for playing. The new PvP just sucks.

I got a new phone and I installed this game on it and it put me on level 5. I was on level 32. I had 56 stars and my combat power was on 72000. If it don't update the game with my current data I don't think I am going to play it anymore. I don't want to star all over again.

Pretty decent game, shame you need to pay gems for the second last ship. The PvP is fun but half the time reduces my gold when I win. Cannot see the devs replying to any messages so unsure if they care
It sucks so much. I would rather jump off a building and put hot sauce up my butt than play this game. DO NOT GET THIS GAME. IT WILL MAKE YOU HAVE BLOODY HERSHEY SQUIRTS

Th game is fun and addicting. Way to many ads!!! Ahhhh My gold counter doesnt always register after endless mode is over. Gives me dble gold if i watch ad but doesnt register after endless battle sometimes. Would gave better review but that sux when it happens. Fix!!!!
description: Earth's last hope is in your hands, take control of the lone spaceship and protect Earth from alien swarms. Your goal will be quite challenging as you will have to save the Universe from its evil enemies. comments: I gave it three stars because not too far along in the game, it turns into a "pay to win" game. Some boards simply don't give you enough moves, so you're forced to use coins to continue or retry and lose a life.  I don't mind hard games, but I detest micro transactions being needed so soon into it.. I'm at level 24, that's it, and already the board doesn't even give you a fighting chance to beat it without using coins.

Its a nice game! But it just takes forever to open a new level. Sometimes your on one for days. That's just to long. That's why I pay farm inland. You can play for hours with out bring stopped no lives. . I want a game that's fun and relaxing. No hard or extra hard ones. I really like cleaning and fixing thing. Be nice if you could do more area and less puzzle.

I love decorating the rooms but I am having to pay too much to get enough points to do it.   I also don't like that each room requires more points to do the tasks than the previous room.  I have changed my rating to low because you end up spending too much of your own money to get powerful to get your stars to complete the tasks.  They also lose your purchases.  I bought a desk chair yesterday and now it is missing and the task is gone too.  Rip off.

This game is awesome. But the stars, please increase the amount of star not just 1. Make it 2 for the Hard Level. And lastly, it's hard to download new rooms when it always appear the Technical Error. Better if you do not require to download it and the user can open it without connecting to internet. However, the game is great for relaxing. Keep up the good work!

Never thought it would be this addictive! At first i thought "Oh, its THAT game that always pops up in advertisements." but after deciding to give it a try, i am hooked!   I introduced homescapes to my mom as well and downloaded it for her and she finds it adorable and fun as well. We both take time to chill out and have fun with the puzzles occasionally when we are together.   I cant find a single flaw or critique for this game, its amazing :)

Veeery enjoyable game! I feel like it's advertised too much, but it's definitely worth playing. Especially if you love games like Bejeweled!  Some of the levels are unnecessarily difficult to get by. You have to either get lucky, or be some type of strategic genius to pass them within a good time frame. That's slightly disappounting. Its too much of an encouragement to use money.
description: Welcome to Homescapes! Help Austin the butler bring warmth and comfort back to his wonderful family's mansion. Come on in—adventures await you from the moment you walk in the door! Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home! The game features:● Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!● Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.● Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!● A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!● Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.● A cute pet: meet а naughty and fluffy cat.● Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house! Give the old mansion a complete makeover! Show off your designer skills by furnishing and decorating the kitchen, hall, orangery, and other house areas, including the garage! Thousands of design options will give you maximum freedom to explore your creativity, change designs any time you want, and eventually create your dream house!Homescapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu. Enjoying Homescapes? Learn more about the game!Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/homescapes/Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/homescapes_mobile/ Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to homescapes@playrix.com
descriptionHTML:
Welcome to Homescapes! Help Austin the butler bring warmth and comfort back to his wonderful family's mansion. Come on in—adventures await you from the moment you walk in the door!

Beat colorful match-3 levels to renovate and decorate rooms in the mansion, unlocking ever more chapters in the exciting family story along the way! What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home!

The game features:

● Unique gameplay: help Austin renovate the house by swapping and matching pieces!
● Interior design: you decide what the house will look like.
● Exciting match-3 levels: tons of fun, featuring unique boosters and explosive combinations!
● A huge, beautiful mansion: discover all the secrets it holds!
● Fantastic characters: watch them live their lives and interact with each other in the in-game social network.
● A cute pet: meet а naughty and fluffy cat.
● Invite your Facebook friends to help you create your own cozy atmosphere in the house!

Give the old mansion a complete makeover! Show off your designer skills by furnishing and decorating the kitchen, hall, orangery, and other house areas, including the garage! Thousands of design options will give you maximum freedom to explore your creativity, change designs any time you want, and eventually create your dream house!

Homescapes is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this option, simply turn it off in your device's Restrictions menu.

Enjoying Homescapes? Learn more about the game!
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/homescapes/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/homescapes_mobile/

Questions? Contact our Tech Support by sending an email to homescapes@playrix.com
developerAddress: The Digital Hub, Dublin 8, Ireland
recentChanges: Enjoy a new Homescapes update!
FLYING HIGH TOURNAMENT
• Make paper planes to finish in the top and win valuable pieces
• Get to know a new character: Jerry Doyle, a tournament planner
ALSO FEATURING
• A new element: Ice Bomb. Deactivate it before it freezes the adjacent tiles
• A new part of the storyline: create your dream garage and fix a retro car
• And many other improvements
summary: Homescapes
title: Homescapes

comments: So I think just about everyone has heard of this game... Buuuuuuut there are some newbies here so I'll explain. Its a multiplayer game and It's in my opinion that It is probibly #2 best game I've ever played. Great concept and I like to get creative on makeing a snake/worm thing. A+ grade. 👌👍

The controls are more difficult than the last time I played this game, which was a year or so ago. The new customization is very cool 👌 but the fact that even the joystick (my usual preference) doesn't make it better at controlling. I don't know whether it is because of my phone or if it is in the app. Nevertheless good job, game is very addictive, keep up the good work 👌

this game is a thousand times better than agar.io in my opinion! It's so much easier to get onto the leader board. Every time I play I get onto the leader board. It's just so addicting and I can't get enough. Everyone in my family loves it too. Creating your own skin is a great option as well. My only complaint is that the 'play online' option is very laggy, and if you fix it would be much appreciated. Thanks for a great game, from sinéad, ella, lauren, mollie, shane and ollie 😊😊

Should allow us to be able to control the speed with a bar level instead of the button. Should make online controllers like offlines. Faster and more sensitive to move. And add a special rare star that floats around the screen rarely that doubles your size by eating it. No matter how big you are. That would be interesting.

Playing this game is total fun. But It would be more Awesome if there will be some sounds & a pause button maybe. One more thing, somebody tell me how to BOOST the Slither because everyone is boosting except me😭😌😶🙄😓😑😫🙃

I'm highly addicted to this game. It's a thousand times better then agar.io in my opinion and it's really cool that you get to create your own skin. The only downer is that I just wish there was some music because you start to get a bit bored after a while.This game is NOT a waste of time, and everyone needs to download it to experience the awesomeness!
description: Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!In slither.io, you have a chance to win even if you're tiny. You can swerve in front of a much larger player to defeat them, no matter how big you are!Download now and start slithering! Good luck!
descriptionHTML:
Play against other people online! Can you become the longest slither?

If your head touches another player, you will explode and then it's game over. But if others run into YOU, then THEY will explode, and you can eat their remains!

Download now and start slithering! Good luck!

comments: I really like playing the game, it's fun with all the different character mechanics, but after the last update there has been a huge increase in ads that take me away from the game and open up play store or chrome. It does this in the middle of a round, so obviously it screws up my gameplay. Makes me consider paying for no ads, but also makes me want to delete.

Addicting and a good time killer, but there are a lot of ads, and every time I downloaded it, it gave my phone a virus. If you have a new and protected phone, get the game, but if you have an old phone, do not get this game. IT WILL GIVE YOUR PHONE A VIRUS AND YOU CAN LOSE EVERYTHING ON IT!!!!!!!!

I would give all 5 stars if the game would work. I played it yesterday on two different devices with no issues and today it is just not responsive. DO NOT DL THIS GAME. TOO MANY SPAM ADS SAYING MY SYSTEM HAS A VIRUS ALONG WITH ADS SAYING I WON A GIFT CARD.....JUST HAVE TO REGISTER ONLINE ETC... DO NOT D.L

An unbelievable amount of ads in an otherwise fun game.   Ads after every match and spam ads trying to open my web browser multiple times mid match, somtimes when I'm preparing my shot which completely ruins it. Such a shame the devs chose to ruin their own game because of greed. Sadly this is more common than not nowadays.

I WANT to like this game. It's fun. The problem is the ads (I'm fine with ads. It's a free game) but mid game it randomly opens ads. I'm talking the kind that take you to a whole new window and tell you your phone is infected and won't let you go back without closing that tab. It screws up your shots and it's just NOT ok. Please fix this mess and I'll redownload and give the game a better review. Ads are one thing but when they make the game unplayable, I have to delete the game.

It's an amazing concept and idea that is very entertaining. The bad thing is that the ads interrupt the game so constantly that it messes up your shots and your online games too.  If that can be fixed so they appear after a match not in the middle of one that redirects you to a page full of ads and false notifications, then it will be a very awesome experience.

comments: Do NOT go for high level military research without searching monster hunting, and Do NOT go for T4 if you not going to spent thousands of dollars. Even if you don't mind to wait 200 days, you will not able to afford it (lvl 10 military Def, Atk, Health cost 100m gold each). DO NOT GO FOR HIGH MILITARY AND T4 WITHOUT FULLY UNDERSTANDING THE GAME.

Ive been playing for the better part of a year, and this game started out great for a long while. But IGG not only panders and gives better deals to Chinese people, cheaper packs etc. But literally 99% of all mega guilds and players are Chinese or Vietnamese. If your not asain don't play this game  you'll end up like me playing forever just to quit because of the obvious discrimination IGG holds with its playerbase

Not a good game for new players.  Was fun and  interesting at first but you qucikly realise that you are just food for high level players with no way to reach a defensible level.  High level players basically teleport in, raid everyone and teleport out.  They should lock servers to keep it balanced and give more guidance for new players. This game is  clearly weighted towards the people who have been playing it the longest. Dont waste your time

Kingdom 249 is open before just 50 days back. And one guild have 2B might. Most of the guys have millions of might one of them got 700M might. How's this is possible. Kingdom 277 is opened before 15 days back but one guild K03 got more powerful. Top guys got 120M might in just 15 days. Does IGG employees playing this game. We are lover of this game please don't lose your credibility. This two kingdom which I observed only Chinese players are strong. How overall kingdom only Chinese players got higher might in less time.

This game is fun but be prepared for the mother of all Pay2win games.  These folks at IGG are experts at crafting new and exciting ways at fleecing their customers of every cent they can.  You CANNOT compete if u dont pay and pay often.  Players here ...just regular people... dump hundreds of rl $$$ regularly.  You have been warned.

The game is awesome and there is always something to do  so you're never stuck waiting around for powerups or new lives. Unlike other games it doesn't require microtransactions to get stronger, but they do help you quicker if you're interested in paying. I'm addicted and play every day.

descriptionHTML:
Want to clash with 110 million global players? Dive into LORDS MOBILE, the real-time strategy mobile MMO game chosen as one of Google Play's Most Competitive Games, and an Android Excellence Game of 2017!

Explore exotic magical lands thrown into chaos by terrifying monsters and powerful enemies. Choose your favorite heroes, make new friends, and charge fearlessly into war! Strike down your foes and build an empire!

FEATURES

Join with millions of players in an open world, on mobile! See, chat, and clash with other players in this MMO game!
☆ Finding Friends ☆
Unite your allies in your kingdom and ride into war together!
☆ Rule as the Emperor ☆
Claim the throne in a battle royale for the kingdom! Will your legacy as a ruler be just or cruel?!

Recruit and upgrade heroes with unique skills and character! Let them lead your kingdom to glory, or mix and match them to complete an RPG-style campaign that you will want to play again and again!

How will you prepare your troops for the clash? Think of new lineups and perfect your strategy! Find the best way to strike down your opponent in this top-notch mobile MMO SLG!

Experience the thrill of war as armies clash in beautiful 3D graphics!
☆ Switching Kingdoms ☆
Establish your empire on new lands by moving to any server you want with a simple tap! Get mobile!

Will you conquer enemy kingdoms and imprison rival lords? Will you liberate prisoners of war? Or will your kingdom and empire crumble to dust?

comments: I think it's a good game but sometimes the ball would go in but then it bounces out you should also add modes, one like there are walls all around and I like the game keep making these addictive games:D also all you guys stop with the adds just turn off your WiFi let them have some money after hard work on many game's like would you want to make a game and not get money and just get  ALL YOUR COMMENTS WITH ADDS! ohhh that would be soo annoying.

I love the game it is so simple yet super fun. Just the only down side is that there are WAY to many ads. I stared playing a round and then an ad pops up.. Like really. At least put a 15 second ad up after the round is finished where you can choose to wat h and ad to continue after you have missed and your time is up. If that person skips the chance then put up and ad. Or just remove them. Thank you dev for the lovely game though ¶:

Don't get me wrong this app is addicting and fun. The thing that ruins this app is ads. For a game were it is meant to be played in quick bursts and you aren't meant to succeed for long periods of time, i don't understand how you can put an ad after every attempt. Sure one per 3 to 5 games and the another 30 second ad, but at the rate they come this game isn't fun anymore. The craziest thing to me is that i can't find a way to invest a few cents into the app to perma-block the ads. Come on dev i know you can do better than this. I will adjust the rating when i am offered a solution. Until then this 4 to 5 star app has 1 to 2 star potential.

Ya hate ads? Turn off wifi and play. Stupid phone/gaming noobs. Its a good game and dont hate on it for ads. The ads make the people who made the game MONEY. Give then a break. Let them have money while u watch something u might want. If u wanna turn it off, like i said, turn off wifi.

It would be 5 stars if for one, the ball didn't just disappear more or less everytime it goes of the screen. And two, if the ball actually moved when i tap the screen rather than decide to just lay on the ground like a dead badger. As for reason three, there are waaaay to many ads. It asks me if i want to watch an ad to continue so then i press no and it still makes me watch an ad, that's just cheap. I understand they have to make money but this is a whole different story here. But  when it does decide to work and when i turn my wifi off, its pretty fun.
Would pay for the game to remove ads. I get you can turn off WiFi/data but it shouldn't be necessary, and is unfair to the company itself. Please offer a paid ad-free version!

comments: So I played it on my iPhone e and loved it. Recently o got a new phone and it's am android. I connected to my Nintendo account and loaded it up. My world seem to be it good shape everything there like in my IPhone but when I went to tour only world one was available. I'm not going to spend another ten dollars to unlock what I already beat so please fix it I wanna keep enjoying this gamr

Love this game and love the nostalgia but there is no way I'm paying £9.99 to level up on any game ever let alone one where a single tap on the screen is the only player interaction. Even with direction control etc like the old days wouldn't make it worth the price being asked.

I have had a very long conversation with someone at the hq and I was talking about the worlds. I bought the worlds on my iPad and downloaded Mario run on this device Android. I ask why my worlds that I purchased on my iPad aren't here. They don't connect that purchase with Nintendo account. When they connect everything else. I told them I am not paying twice so that brings down the rating for me for this game. But great fun and very enjoyable, but get the linking fixed. Seems a bit of a design flaw

I love Mario games. I always think they are fun while challenging. It is UNREASONABLE that you have to purchase the second world and the rest of the worlds. You only have one world that you don't pay for. I get people need money and apps are a great way to get them but you could at least have a bundle that everyone wants. I only play remix 10. Because it's FREE.

This would have got 5 stars had I been able to share it with my 2 kids via family share. I refuse to pay £30 for all 3 of us to have access to all the levels.  Great game though. Fun, quick and easy to play. Many hours spent between us. So many levels too.

I'd say it's worth it even as a free game.  It's a fun game to kill time. Even if you run out of tickets there's many ways you can earn more on the free side. To purchase at 10 bucks the play becomes almost non stop. Good buy, good time killer, challenging, and overall enjoyable game, free or paid for.  5 stars from me.
description: A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.Super Mario Run has received some big updates! You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.■New mode Remix 10Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!■New World Tour coursesA brand-new world of courses, World Star, has been added to World Tour mode! You can play this world after completing the first six worlds.■World TourRun and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser’s clutches! Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.■Toad RallyShow off Mario’s stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow. ■Kingdom BuilderGather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.■What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds・ All courses in World Tour are playableWhy not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?・ Easier to get Rally TicketsIt's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.・ More playable charactersIf you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?・ More courses in Toad RallyThe types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.・ More buildings and decorations in Kingdom BuilderThe types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.・ Play Remix 10 without having to waitYou can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.

■New mode Remix 10
Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!
This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!

■New World Tour courses
A brand-new world of courses, World Star, has been added to World Tour mode! You can play this world after completing the first six worlds.

■World Tour
Run and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser’s clutches!
Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.

Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.

■Toad Rally
Show off Mario’s stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.

In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.
Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow.

■Kingdom Builder
Gather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.

Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.

■What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds

・ All courses in World Tour are playable
Why not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?

・ Easier to get Rally Tickets
It's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.

・ More playable characters
If you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?

・ More courses in Toad Rally
The types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.

・ More buildings and decorations in Kingdom Builder
The types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.

・ Play Remix 10 without having to wait
You can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.

*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply.

description: In this game you have to do different kinds of work.You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! descriptionHTML:
In this game you have to do different kinds of work.
You can become a woodcutter and start cutting wood. Chop it! You can become a builder performing a simple job that requires precision work with a hammer. Nail it! Or you can become a miner - take a heavy pickaxe and start spliting stones. Break it!

You will come across a variety of bonus items. Cut down the stars to spend them on new tools in the store. Break hearts and get an extra opportunity to miss. Split the clock to slow down the time.

Be careful! After all, in addition to bonuses, you can also come across dangerous items that do not like to be beaten with a hammer or pickaxe. Tap them once - and the game will end.

Download "Chop It" for free!
Have a good game!

description: Six! is the latest game from Gram Games, makers of global smash hits 1010! and Merged!. This game is challenging, exciting and infuriating at times. As with all great puzzlers, Six! is great in one minute bursts or hours of emotive fun.In the game you are challenged to interact with a tower block of varying shaped bricks upon which rests a hexagonal block. The aim is to get the hexagon down the tower block to earn points.  You do this by tapping the bricks to make them disappear bringing the hexagon down into the space cleared underneath.It sounds easy, but when the hexagon starts to roll or the tower tilts, and with pressure of high scores you’ll find it’s not as easy as you originally thought. If the removal of the blocks topples the tower  or the hexagon gains momentum and rolls off the screen, then it’s game over and you have to start all over again.  Challenging, emotive and blissfully simple to play. Six! will have you hooked on getting as far down the tower as possible. In keeping with Gram Games’ hits, playing this game is simple and fun, but claiming a spot on the leaderboard and bettering your friends is challenging and rewarding.Key Features●    Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay●    Challenge your friend’s high scores, challenge the world.●    Fun and engaging graphics.●    Engaging and addictive.●    Play for a few minutes or hours at a time.
descriptionHTML:
Six! is the latest game from Gram Games, makers of global smash hits 1010! and Merged!. This game is challenging, exciting and infuriating at times. As with all great puzzlers, Six! is great in one minute bursts or hours of emotive fun.

In the game you are challenged to interact with a tower block of varying shaped bricks upon which rests a hexagonal block. The aim is to get the hexagon down the tower block to earn points. You do this by tapping the bricks to make them disappear bringing the hexagon down into the space cleared underneath.

It sounds easy, but when the hexagon starts to roll or the tower tilts, and with pressure of high scores you’ll find it’s not as easy as you originally thought. If the removal of the blocks topples the tower or the hexagon gains momentum and rolls off the screen, then it’s game over and you have to start all over again.

Challenging, emotive and blissfully simple to play. Six! will have you hooked on getting as far down the tower as possible. In keeping with Gram Games’ hits, playing this game is simple and fun, but claiming a spot on the leaderboard and bettering your friends is challenging and rewarding.

Key Features
● Easy to learn and fun to master gameplay
● Challenge your friend’s high scores, challenge the world.
● Fun and engaging graphics.
● Engaging and addictive.
● Play for a few minutes or hours at a time.
developerAddress: 100 Cambridge Grove, The Aircraft Factory, London W6 0LE, United Kingdom
recentChanges: - Minor bug fixes.
summary: Challenging, emotive and blissfully simple to play
title: Six!

description: Bidding on storage auctions is a very good way to make money, if you’re not afraid to test your luck and instincts, that is. Go full high-stakes, outbid your rivals and turn a profit by selling your valuable acquisitions in your own pawn shop. You’ll be rich and powerful in no time!HIGHLIGHTS💸PROFIT from your smart deals and unlock new buildings in town to expand your business and make even more money!💸OUTBID your competition in edge-of-your-seat storage auctions. Enjoy intense gameplay as you choose, analyze and bid faster than your rivals in auctions all over the world!💸RUN your own pawn shop and display your rare and valuable acquisitions. Make customers come from all over the world to spend money on your business and make you rich!💸LIVE through a gripping story with engaging characters on your quest to turn your rundown family business into a city-wide business empire!💸GET KNOWN in the auction world and be noticed by big names on the scene: you never know who might want to do business with you!💸COLLECT a wide range of exotic items, from rare antiques you can restore to cars and boats you can renovate and sell at an epic profit!Take part in every auction and don’t miss a single opportunity to bid: some of these musty old garages hide treasures beyond your wildest dreams! description: Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.
descriptionHTML:
Can you bring the taste of the whole world into one game? In Tasty Town it's possible!

Your success in Tasty Town starts with 3 Fs: Fresh Farm Food! Grow fresh produce at your farm and take it to your restaurant, where international chefs will do their magic in the kitchen to deliver delicious dishes for your customers. Don't worry if you need a hand from time to time: helping and being helped is part of the experience! Create or join a Chefs Club with friends to complete events and get special rewards.

Your gourmet customers may order anything, from a burger, pizza or sushi to a cake or a muffin, so be ready to craft the perfect dish at all times!

However, it isn't all about the cooking: Make sure you have a nice building with crazy wonders that will make you popular and decorations that show off your classy taste.

- Collect chefs from all over the world, level them up in the Academy, and cook tasty international recipes.

- Grow fresh vegetables and raise happy animals at your Farm to produce your own ingredients.

- Decorate your restaurant with extravagant wonders. They'll make you popular! The more popular you become, the more you'll be able to improve your restaurant.

- Join forces with other players in your Chefs Club. You'll make friends and become the best in the business!

- Expand your business in the town by catering parties at the Chillout Area and completing orders with your Delivery Trucks.

Tasty Town is FREE to download and FREE to play. However, you can purchase in-app items for the game with real money. If you wish to disable this feature, please turn off the in-app purchases in your phone or tablet’s Settings.

Llacuna 166,

recentChanges: Full storage? Now you can sell dishes, ingredients and items instantly, right from your storage!

summary: Manage it all from the farm to the kitchen to build your dream restaurant!
title: Tasty Town

comments: Very annoying problem with Google Play account disconnections at task swap. Fix this, and I will be able to actually play the game. Since I use my phone for making real income, I need to swap screens to other activities, and each time do a four step log in process back into the game. I have never seen this problem before in any other game, no reason this game would be different. About the game? Well, I'll tell when this problem is gone 😅

This is a great game. I have played it for over 2 years now and it's still my favorite game. Advice to newbies, take your time. Stay in one age and build up your resources before moving on. You can play in multiple worlds, join guilds, make friends and they have great quests to do if you choose to.

It is  great game, for ages 10 and up even 9 is okay. It is cool that we are building a town from scratch, like from the prehistoric time, and building our way up. Not like other game that start you off with big present day buildings. It doesn't cost a lot to do things like building and removing things, some object are free, they give the right amount of money and you can always win some more diamonds. In other games you would have to pay to remove object and buildings are ridiculously expensive.  It is hard to make money in other games and to make diamonds. I personally at night put my hunters too make things that take 8 hours and in the day things that take 5 to 15 minutes but sometimes 1hour. It is a very good game, it is almost as a real life city town, empire.

Boring!! Hurry up and wait. Never enough coins and forge points. Constantly waiting for buildings to make money and points. Ready made buildings. Can't build your own. Waiting, waiting, waiting. Been playing about 2 hours and already bored to death!

Started playing, made some progress, then the next time I went to play it wouldn't link back to my Google account and kept saying incorrect password. You get one star because that was frustrating and I couldn't get back to the game I already made progress on. UNINSTALLED...

Fist of all guys I want to thank you for your great job at making this game better  Second when I have my gondola market of any other building with water...I can't conect it to the main ocean outside the map....which basically doesn't make any sense to have a huge sea ship at the center of the city 😂  So could you please make it possible to connect gondola market(and not only thing that has water in it) to the main ocean outside the map   Thank you for your attention :)   ❤ you guys )
description: Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.FEATURES- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods- Produce supplies to manufacture goods- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sectorForge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access. Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.Imprint:	https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint
descriptionHTML:
Come and play Forge of Empires! Take control over a city and become the leader of an aspiring kingdom. Guide it through the ages, research new technologies, expand your empire and live through an epic story. Battle other players and prove your skills as king and warlord.

FEATURES

- Build your city and evolve from the Stone Age to modern times (and beyond).
- Develop new technologies and discover new buildings and goods
- Produce supplies to manufacture goods
- Exchange your goods and trade with your neighbors
- Discover new territories and seize control of the provinces and their rewards
- Use your negotiation or battle skills to take over sector by sector

Forge of Empires is based on our successful browser strategy game which was published by InnoGames, developers of fantasy strategy game Elvenar, in the summer of 2012. Finally, the online strategy game is available for Android as well, providing cross-platform access.

Forge of Empires is free to download and install. However, some game features can also be purchased for real money. If you don't want to use this feature, please disable in­app purchases in your device's settings. A network connection is also required.

Imprint: https://legal.innogames.com/portal/us/imprint
developerAddress:
InnoGames GmbH
Friesenstraße 13
20097 Hamburg
Germany

summary: Build and advance your city from a stone age village to a future metropolis.
title: Forge of Empires

It is far too difficult to advance in this game without spending money. The developers get money from ads, and I'm willing to watch them, but not for 1 diamond every 30 seconds, when the smallest upgrade in weapons is 360. They must not want people to keep playing an otherwise good game.

Engaging game but not for everyone. Long hours of playing will make you suffer from depression and anxiety disorders. As it is not an universal game I recommend to try it out then discard it completely.... On the operational side this game performs extremely well on any Android smart phones without a hitch but, I recommend at least 3 GB ram to play this game properly otherwise it will be a clingy clangy ride on your eyes.....
Played a bunch of sniper games and so far this one's #1. Going to keep playing and hope i wont have to change my 5star rating. Thanks for a fun free game developers!. Now playing on LG6

You can earn diamonds watching videos but I would rather play a game than waste time watching stupid add so I can play a game. It was fun but no more. Deleting.

Forget those dumb, repetitive shooting games. Here, your duty will include racing against time, exploding helicopters in American cities, killing zombies and quite a few shots in slow motion. comments: One way to check how much products I have left is by touching the machine and thr corresponding product but sometimes the game will assume  that you are putting the product into production hence it will put the product into production whether you want it or not so it will waste production time. Sometimes the touch is too sensitive. Sometimes the touch is not sensitive enough which forces me to drag the product into the production slot up to 10 ten times just to start production. I know this feedback is not much but maybe an undo button will help. It makes the gameplay million times difference if you  put your players comfort a priority.

Long time player returning to the game after taking a break. I leveled up to level 41 today. Before leveling up it showed I should get 1 white and 1 black rabbit with the new level but I didn't get either of them. I would also like to see it a bit easier to get wildlife refuge animals. 36 puzzle pieces seems a bit much.

They keep taking my diamonds and telling me I spent them somewhere. Like I spent 19 on fast tracking 1 Coco tree while I have Tom for 6 days and 102 Coco's in my silo then tell me they can't refund it because I'm a liar! They took 50 from my husband and only refunded him 30!! Super cell is ripping players off!!

I buy an axe it will last forever same thing with other tools but here I have to keep buying tools to do the job. An if I need more crop I get the land ready for more seeding get the water. This you have to bring in more people that never show up to do the work. That's why if I'm going to farm I count on one person me. Here you need others. It not for me.

I hate that every time I purchase a decoration it goes more and more expensive it ridiculous can one stone wall go up to 10,000! I mean that's crazy. Also it would be good if you added a edit program that allows you to get rid of everything on your farm except of the house and other things like that and then you can put it how you want it so basically decoration or designing your farm.
