description: Beep, beep! Alfie Atkins and his friends are waiting for you to visit them in their wonderous world. Together with Alfie, you will build a clean world and recycle different materials to build roads, houses, stores, schools, parks and much much more. As the community grows, you and Alfie will help the citiziens with fun things/activities in the city. You will be able to recharge your electric car, shop in the store, go to the doctor's, pick fruit, rake leaves, and stop fires with fire hose. In return you will receive lots of love from the citizens and generous rewards to continue your important work. This is a game featuring many hours of fun for both young and old players. The game is free to download. If you like it and want to buy the full version then you can make a one time purchase inside the app. You will be able to continue building the world you've created in the free version. Beep, beep, Alfie Atkins is a game specially developed for children aged 3 to 9 years old. There are no elements featuring stress or timers. Children can play the game in the time they need and there's always an opportunity for them to continue playing the game.THE FREE VERSION:* 5 city blocks with roads and many construction sites where you can build houses, parks and stores/shops* 9 different mini games* 5 vehicles to drive* Totally free to play!* Totally free from 3rd party ads and commercialsTHE FULL VERSION:* The full version is purchased through the in app purchase function, this is the only purchase in the game. The player keeps all progress and can continue to build what they started in the free version* Total access to the entire world (a world that will continue to grow in future updates)* 25 vehicles (more to follow in future updates)* 15 mini games (more to follow in future updates)FEATURES: * Multi touch - play together simultaneously* Build, craft, paint, play -  explore a child's creativity  * Kid friendly interface - easy to understand and navigate* No 3rd party advertisingBeep, beep - let start!ABOUT GRO PLAY:Gro Play creates GOOD GAME experiences to entertain and inspire children and their families to learn more about health, wellbeing and sustainable living. We believe that play is not only the most fun, but also the most powerful way to learn. By entertaining and inspiring children and their parents, we are shaping a healthier and more sustainable future for us all. Gro Play is a proud winner of the Swedish Living Green award 2012.STAY TUNED Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/GroPlay Instagram: http://www.instagr.am/GroPlay Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/GroPlay Website: www.GroPlay.com
descriptionHTML:
Beep, beep! Alfie Atkins and his friends are waiting for you to visit them in their wonderous world. Together with Alfie, you will build a clean world and recycle different materials to build roads, houses, stores, schools, parks and much much more. As the community grows, you and Alfie will help the citiziens with fun things/activities in the city. You will be able to recharge your electric car, shop in the store, go to the doctor's, pick fruit, rake leaves, and stop fires with fire hose. In return you will receive lots of love from the citizens and generous rewards to continue your important work. This is a game featuring many hours of fun for both young and old players.

The game is free to download. If you like it and want to buy the full version then you can make a one time purchase inside the app. You will be able to continue building the world you've created in the free version.

Beep, beep, Alfie Atkins is a game specially developed for children aged 3 to 9 years old. There are no elements featuring stress or timers. Children can play the game in the time they need and there's always an opportunity for them to continue playing the game.

THE FREE VERSION:
* 5 city blocks with roads and many construction sites where you can build houses, parks and stores/shops
* 9 different mini games
* 5 vehicles to drive
* Totally free to play!
* Totally free from 3rd party ads and commercials

THE FULL VERSION:
* The full version is purchased through the in app purchase function, this is the only purchase in the game. The player keeps all progress and can continue to build what they started in the free version
* Total access to the entire world (a world that will continue to grow in future updates)
* 25 vehicles (more to follow in future updates)
* 15 mini games (more to follow in future updates)

FEATURES:
* Multi touch - play together simultaneously
* Build, craft, paint, play - explore a child's creativity
* Kid friendly interface - easy to understand and navigate
* No 3rd party advertising

Beep, beep - let start!

ABOUT GRO PLAY:
Gro Play creates GOOD GAME experiences to entertain and inspire children and their families to learn more about health, wellbeing and sustainable living. We believe that play is not only the most fun, but also the most powerful way to learn. By entertaining and inspiring children and their parents, we are shaping a healthier and more sustainable future for us all. Gro Play is a proud winner of the Swedish Living Green award 2012.

comments: It's nice game - very nice graphic, very smooth moving - it would be 5 stars. BUT - I payed for levels 13 and 14 , and the game does not allow me to play in random order - it's not possible to play no. 23 without finishing all numbers before. If you are stuck in some number, you cannot go to another one - you MUST BUY hint!!! It means - you PAID for the game, but you MUST PAY again for hint - or you are blocked in PAID  game. It's just not fair.

A lot of Numberlink programs have "fake" puzzles - they have multiple solutions unless additional non-standard "rules" are followed... which are NEVER fun. This app doesn't do that. These are the real deal, and are VERY satisfying to solve. The price is extremely low for the quantity and quality on offer; I highly recommend this game.

So far, I dig this game. Although, the individuality of it is scarce. I still play it and enjoy it. It's not identical to other games of this type, as the challenges are similar yet different. The scenario of the game is basic with the others. I have a variety when it comes to games, this one has similar sound affects to other games that I, personally, downloaded. (But they're also from the same makers.) This game is over all.... Good so far.. I would recommend, linked my account to this game and invited friends and family. (I only do so, if the game/app is worthy. I'm a picky bull!!!!) Overall, you'll have fun! Cute toys and  unique power ups, with a slightly (10%) twist.

Definitely addicting. The levels are challenging, the tools are fun to figure out and the reward set up is not unattainable. The only other thing is they grew more wise  for the latest update, you can't change the time on your phone to add lives anymore! Probably better that way, one (read: I) should pace themselves when playing....

This is by far the most fun I've  had with a game app! Its so cute and  colorful!  And each increase in difficulty  makes you want to keep coming back for the next challenge.  What also makes it awesome  is a no brainer,  its great for children and adults alike.  BIG THUMBS UP!

Really enjoyed the game until I was entered in a two week tournament.  Now, the boards are incredibly difficult and I can no longer earn prizes on a regular basis. comments: lnstaII 'VEARN' App Enterr (CRETA) to Start Earning So far so good.Fun way to get money. Won't make you rich but the extra cash is helpful. It's also the best exchange rate on points. McEarn points equals mc instead of like some of the others where it takes VEarn points to reach vc etc...Also, lnstaII 'TOYOCASH' App Enterr (TRDG) very reliable in paying you when you redeem to toyocash. You can choose assorted giftcards as payment or transfer to Walet for cash. Your choice. I love these guys thanks for addingsome fun to my day.

I love the game play and graphics. But I payed for adidas female clothing and an aquarium previously on the game, and then when I restarted, they have gone. I spend £3 on it in total and I actually spent more money on other things that didn't come back in the next game, but it's understandable because they were lifestyle points and you know it's currency not clothing or furniture. I uninstall sims sometimes a bit of always go back and before my items were there, but now they're not and that really frustrated me. I actually ended up in 2017 spending  £10 on sims freeplay and that's the only money I think I will ever spend on ot now because if you restart,  you don't get anything you wanted. Please fix this because I spent that money and I could've bought something else with it but I didn't because I like sims.

Overall,  this is a great game. Two requests.  1) Selling multiple items at once.  I bought a load of junk and I need to sell it!  2) Make the schools "playable",  like the police station. I was talking to my sister about this and it'd be cool if the schools were playable and you could build clubs inside it. Anyway,  I loved everything in the game! So fun,  so creative.

First, I don't like that the game is in realtime it makes it a lot less fun and more boring. Secondly, I don't like that you HAVE to buy things just to get vip. I know that the prices are quite low but if you're just a kid like me then that limits what you can do. Lastly, I want more jobs and maybe even school to be playable it would just seem reasonable and make the game more addicting. Overall the game is really enjoyable but could do better, still keep up the good work!

Love it addictive,if u like the sims on the pc you will like this.If you are a patient person you don't need to spend money either. Update it has lost stars as I don't want to spend money and now you need vip to get to the next stages of things. Disappointed with this. If you didn't have to pay for anything it would be 5 stars.

Im hardcore addicted to this game. I have only 2 complaints about this game. The first is that there isnt a cheaper $1 or $2 life point pack, just for like 5 life points. I love this game but not enough to spend $5 on the cheapest life points.  My second complaint is that babies almost seem to be the defult sim that you switch to as soon as you make an adult do anything. Because of this i end up just making the babies hibernate constantly because of how annoying it is if you are trying to make all your sims grow crops or something.  Other than that, i love it.

description: FIFA Mobile has been reimagined to bring you the most authentic and exciting mobile soccer game you’ll ever experience! Get a free Cristiano Ronaldo item to start building and managing your team. Train any player to superstar status, attack opponents, and keep coming back for daily content all season long. Plus, get into the game on the go with a download size of under 100 MB. Whether you’re a savvy veteran or just starting out on the pitch, FIFA Mobile is your source for soccer.BUILD YOUR ULTIMATE TEAM™Develop the most competitive squad when you choose any 11 players from over 550 real teams, including stars from past and present, and train them to over 100 OVR. Add depth to your roster, manage your lineup on the fly, and quickly tweak tactics before every match. Make the right calls and watch your club become the Ultimate Team. ATTACK TO WINTake on thrilling matches that drop you into your offensive possessions with VS Attack mode. This innovative level of competition kicks your game into high gear while you strive to dominate 90-second matches, climb the leaderboards, and earn seasonal rewards year-round. KEEP UP WITH REAL-WORLD EVENTSStay connected to real-world soccer as it happens across the globe. Test your skills in single-player Campaign mode, then challenge yourself with uniquely themed Events where you can earn incredible prizes.JOIN A LEAGUE, CONQUER THE WORLDParticipate in Leagues, a truly social experience that allows you to join forces and strive for glory with friends and gamers around the globe. Test your skills in inter-league championships, or take on the best gamers worldwide in League vs. League Tournaments to climb the leaderboards and prove your talent on the pitch.This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Game Center/Google Play Game Services. Log out of Game Center/Google Play Game Services before installation if you don’t want to share your game play with friends.User Agreement: http://terms.ea.comPrivacy and Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com/enVisit http://help.ea.com/en/# for assistance or inquiries.EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on ea.com/service-updates.

Take on thrilling matches that drop you into your offensive possessions with VS Attack mode. This innovative level of competition kicks your game into high gear while you strive to dominate 90-second matches, climb the leaderboards, and earn seasonal rewards year-round.

KEEP UP WITH REAL-WORLD EVENTS
Stay connected to real-world soccer as it happens across the globe. Test your skills in single-player Campaign mode, then challenge yourself with uniquely themed Events where you can earn incredible prizes.

JOIN A LEAGUE, CONQUER THE WORLD
Participate in Leagues, a truly social experience that allows you to join forces and strive for glory with friends and gamers around the globe. Test your skills in inter-league championships, or take on the best gamers worldwide in League vs. League Tournaments to climb the leaderboards and prove your talent on the pitch.

This app: Requires a persistent Internet connection (network fees may apply). Requires acceptance of EA’s Privacy & Cookie Policy and User Agreement. Includes in-game advertising. Contains direct links to the Internet and social networking sites intended for an audience over 13. The app uses Game Center/Google Play Game Services. Log out of Game Center/Google Play Game Services before installation if you don’t want to share your game play with friends.

User Agreement: http://terms.ea.com
Privacy and Cookie Policy: privacy.ea.com/en
Visit http://help.ea.com/en/# for assistance or inquiries.
EA may retire online features after 30 days’ notice posted on ea.com/service-updates.

comments: Love that you can now earn gems from reading.  However part of the fun of games like this is the outfits and personalization of your character. Outfits and style choices should be free to choose the best one that advances you in the story. It's not fun playing a game that forces you to fail/have a negative outcome. Big decisions/game altering choices should cost gems that makes it fun spending your savings but ultimately free outfit/style choices please

I LOVE THIS! But, just a thing, you could like ask on every episode (that the app creators make) like 'what's your gender and preference to date' because all the creator made ones at like just girls, and I know males play as well. Not hating AT ALL,I LOVE this app SO MUCH! Just tryna help ya improve! Luv you episode! (Or make more that are inclusive of gender) MEOW LOVE U

I really like 90% of this game. However, the way the passes are done really suck. I absolutely love when the 30 days unlimited ad free pass comes up for $9.99. Without it I practically refuse to play. It doesn't seem to be available as of a few days ago. I'm glad I recently purchased. Would also be cool to have a feature where you can send passes to friends.

It's an ok app and this is my third time redownloading it, the character designs have gotten better but there only problem I have, the tickets, like really? 2 tickets? First it was 5, then 3, now only 2. Not everyone has money to waste on games, especially tickets, not only that but their overpriced, like any other add on pack/item. I wouldn't even be surprised if I deleted this and redownloaded back in a year and they only give you one ticket a day.

Love this game! The only part I don't like is that all of the best options cost diamonds and you literally have to pay for them. It makes sense for an app, but it happens to often. It ruins the story because I won't buy any diamonds. I'll rate this 5 stars if they at least change it to not as often.

I LOVE IT except in pitch perfect, ALL the good choices cost 20 diamonds and I'm not wasting my money on all of that. Can you make it less often? And the passes take too long to come back. Or at least make it more passes every 3 hours

What better way to enter the world of International Hockey than skating out for your team in the Winter Games! Go stick to stick with some of the greatest teams and come away with the gold medal!

Six club teams from USA, CANADA and RUSSIA will battle it out to be crowned the 3 ON 3 SUPER SERIES Champions. Which team will you guide to the finals?

description: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay. The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster- Unique gameplay based on free fall- High performance on any device- Convenient management of the game- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight- Fascinating drop down- Music that complements the gameplay- Realistic graphics- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving- Dynamic mapThis is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.Attention:Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
descriptionHTML:
Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas - an action game with a unique gameplay.

The protagonist is a gangster who was in a state of free fall in a mine filled with various obstacles. Your task is to manage to bypass obstacles in order to prolong the already short life of a real gangster.
But do not think that we threw this dangerous guy into the thick of events without the right to survive. At your disposal will be bonuses that will increase the chances of survival, such as winding time, jerk and others. But whatever you do, this gangsta will still die, the only question is how many meters will he live, falling in an infinitely low mine. Use all your strengths, do not let the bandit break into a cake in the first 10 meters.

Compete with your friends, whose gangster will fly the longest distance! It all depends on your reaction and your skills.

Features of Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

- 3D game from the third person in the style of San Andreas
- Real gangsters like in games or Gangster
- Unique gameplay based on free fall
- High performance on any device
- Convenient management of the game
- No Weiss City, only Gangster in free flight
- Fascinating drop down
- Music that complements the gameplay
- Realistic graphics
- The best game about Basejumping, Wingsuit and skydiving
- Dynamic map

This is a runner based on free fall, and unlike other runners, there is complete freedom of movement.

Attention:
Use the joystick on the left side of the screen to move around, and also operate the camera on the right side of the screen to look around.
summary: The best simulator of falling real Gangster!
title: Grand Stunt Jump San Andreas

description: Ever dreamed of becoming a super kids dentist? Make your dreams come true with Dentist Hospital Adventure! Where you can experience being a super crazy kid dentist in hospital full of crazy doctors, cure patient or use all your skills to perform the craziest surgery ever! Enjoy the thrill of being a superhero kid dentist to cure all kids coming to your clinic and bringing them back from trauma. The injured patients suffer from kinds of teeth problems like bad teeth, tooth cavity, dental calculus, dental treatment, dentist mania & they might need an emergency surgery & treatment. Sterilize your tools and keep your dental chair prepared for treatment. Be careful, don’t get the bones and face skin damaged. Make use of injection, magic potion, droppers and all the medical tools you need & perform crazy fun dentist routines surgery fill cavities, remove plaques, whiten teeth, squirt water, brush, and much more. Going to the dentist is something that not many people like to do, although to have a nice clean smile it has to be done. In Dentist hospital Adventure you can kill all the germs away, remove any holes that may be cracked, suck all the gum from the teeth, as well as remove and pull any rotten or cracked teeth in the dental surgery game. Treat patients with professional doctor tools like syringes, dental tweezers & more.Welcome to Dentist Hospital Adventure, you have a chance to help your patients, to prove that you are a super kids dentist! Gain experience to become the expert dentist and kids doctor. Help these poor patient, so they can feel better again with an amazing dentist treatment. Kids get hurt all the time while playing at home or in their schools or in parks. Curing those little kids is a great crazy fun. Brush dirty teeth to kill those germs, pull out the painful teeth, fight bacteria to prevent tooth decay, apply colorful braces and apply dental surgery braces to straighten the misaligned teeth. Some kid patients have a fear of visiting the dentist’s office. Be good to them. Become an ultimate professional crazy fun dentist to gain dental treatment learning experience in this surgery simulator game. Be the best braces surgeon; enjoy tooth cleaning and teeth alignment at dental surgery clinic. Ask your patients to brush daily otherwise they will get a cavity. Enjoy and play fun-filled kid dentist surgery mini games for girls and boys. Do not poke the dental equipment in your patient’s eye, nose, ear or face. Check every patient’s dental health condition before carrying out the dental surgery simulation. Apply stitches after you are done with the oral surgery.Dentist Hospital Adventure features:√ Select your patient with bad teeth for dental treatment.√ Scan the teeth to determine the condition .√ Clean it and remove cavities and fungus with medical equipment .√ Brush the teeth, clean it with water then suck out the extra water.√ Use stain removal to remove stains.√ Perform dental surgery and application of oral braces.√ Pull out the rotten broken teeth in this surgery simulator game.

comments: Awesome game I had ever played in my life... although I'm 20 just..😉😉 I just loved the game.today 21/02/2018 I installed it on my phone.within 1 hr I played 100+ times. Till now my highest score is 74 & I'm in challenge 25. Really loved this game very much. I recommend this game to my each & every friend...(even my enemy also...😂😂 Just kidding) I wished that I will cross 1000+ score on future.  Loved this game. Lots of Love to this game & ketchapp. 😘😘😘❤️❤️❤️

A simple, addictive yet hard and raging game. I love how you can customize your spheres and roads--and to turn off the ads just turn off your WiFi or data. Honestly, after 250 it gets a little impossible to play lol. Keep up the good work, Ketchapp!

Enjoyed, On a overall basis i really enjoyed the game. And i also finished all the 100 challenges within a time of 5 days, as the game is really captivating i kept on continuously playing it. But now i am kind of bored from it as there's nothing to do after i have completed the 100 challenges. If there is an addition of another 100 more challenges that would make the game more fun to play and i would enjoy it thoroughly. Also i am not sure how will i earn the other spehers and roads without any challenges, so if anyone can help me how in figuring that out it would be really nice. At the end the game is really good. Cheers to the creaters.
Fun little time killer. My only problem is that daily rewards fail to show up most days. It could be a problem on my end, but I don't know, and it's a pretty small issue so I don't really care.

Another great game from ketchapp. A very unique idea, executed well and with nice graphics. It is simple yet difficult, a good combination. I gave it 4 stars however, as sometimes the game takes a while to respond to my touch, and often doesn't respond at all. My phone is quite slow though, so I'm willing to give the game the benefit of the doubt.

I've noticed that when I get higher in the challenges the ones involving lane switching glitch out and never let me complete it. I have counted and I don't think it is possible for me to have counted incorrectly 20+ times repeatedly. Also now whenever I boot up the game it has the beginner tutorial pop-up telling you what to do which is annoying.

description: Lek och lär med Tripp, Trapp, Träd!Utforska, upplev och skapa tillsammans med UR:s språkstärkande och begreppsutvecklande app för förskolebarn och pedagoger. Här möter du ekollonen Tripp och Trapp som bor i det stora trädet Träd.I APPEN KAN NI- Utforska världen kring Träd både dag och natt, och leka med ekollonen Tripp och Trapp.- Sjunga, spela, dansa och programmera ljudslingor med koltrasten Kol-Erik, hermelinen Härm-Elin och Elke Ekorre i fågelholken.- Skapa med ljud, bilder och begrepp i pekboken.- Projicera interaktiva mönster och miljöer som skapar förundran och inspirerar till lek.- Titta och lyssna på sagor, sånger och på andra barn som berättar om sin vardag.- Skapa stora och små magiska kryp tillsammans.OM TRIPP, TRAPP, TRÄDTripp, Trapp, Träd är en lekfull värld med funktioner som är språkutvecklande och begreppsstärkande. Tripp, Trapp, Träd ska väcka nyfikenhet och inspirera till lärande lek i och utanför appen och lägga grund för samtal och interaktion mellan barn, samt mellan barn och pedagoger.Tripp, Trapp, Träd ingår i UR:s större satsning mot förskolan som också innefattar pedagogiska magasin som sänds i radio och tv och som finns tillgängliga på UR:s webbplats. I arbetet med att ta fram appen har UR tagit hjälp av förskolebarn och pedagoger, samt forskare och sakkunniga inom området.OM URSveriges Utbildningsradio AB (UR) är en del av public service med fokus på att stärka kunskap och bildning. UR:s program utgår från användarnas behov och finns fritt tillgängliga på webben under lång tid. På så vis utgör UR en kunskapsbank som bidrar till ett livslångt lärande.
descriptionHTML:
Lek och lär med Tripp, Trapp, Träd!

Utforska, upplev och skapa tillsammans med UR:s språkstärkande och begreppsutvecklande app för förskolebarn och pedagoger. Här möter du ekollonen Tripp och Trapp som bor i det stora trädet Träd.

I APPEN KAN NI
- Utforska världen kring Träd både dag och natt, och leka med ekollonen Tripp och Trapp.
- Sjunga, spela, dansa och programmera ljudslingor med koltrasten Kol-Erik, hermelinen Härm-Elin och Elke Ekorre i fågelholken.
- Skapa med ljud, bilder och begrepp i pekboken.
- Projicera interaktiva mönster och miljöer som skapar förundran och inspirerar till lek.
- Titta och lyssna på sagor, sånger och på andra barn som berättar om sin vardag.
- Skapa stora och små magiska kryp tillsammans.

OM TRIPP, TRAPP, TRÄD
Tripp, Trapp, Träd är en lekfull värld med funktioner som är språkutvecklande och begreppsstärkande. Tripp, Trapp, Träd ska väcka nyfikenhet och inspirera till lärande lek i och utanför appen och lägga grund för samtal och interaktion mellan barn, samt mellan barn och pedagoger.

Tripp, Trapp, Träd ingår i UR:s större satsning mot förskolan som också innefattar pedagogiska magasin som sänds i radio och tv och som finns tillgängliga på UR:s webbplats. I arbetet med att ta fram appen har UR tagit hjälp av förskolebarn och pedagoger, samt forskare och sakkunniga inom området.

OM UR
Sveriges Utbildningsradio AB (UR) är en del av public service med fokus på att stärka kunskap och bildning. UR:s program utgår från användarnas behov och finns fritt tillgängliga på webben under lång tid. På så vis utgör UR en kunskapsbank som bidrar till ett livslångt lärande.
recentChanges: Bug fixar och optimeringar.
summary: Explore, create, play and learn along with the acorns and the Tripp Trapp.
title: Tripp, Trapp, Träd

description: The ColorPix is an antistress coloring by numbers for adults and children. The ColorPix is the free coloring book. You shouldn't pay for anything! ColorPix has an antistress and relaxing effect. If you don’t have any skills in painting you can try coloring by numbers. The coloring book by numbers is the easiest way to create a beautiful image on your own hands!Coloring by numbers is quite simple even for small kids. We choose a lot of pretty images in pixel art which can be liked by children e.g. kids can color a unicorn or any animals.There are a lot of easy images for kids. Also, many pixel images for adults are available too. For example, you can color a unicorn or an astronaut.Please, rate our coloring app ColorPix! It’s very important for us because your reviews highly motivate us to improve the coloring pages 2018!
descriptionHTML:
The ColorPix is an antistress coloring by numbers for adults and children. The ColorPix is the free coloring book. You shouldn't pay for anything!

ColorPix has an antistress and relaxing effect. If you don’t have any skills in painting you can try coloring by numbers. The coloring book by numbers is the easiest way to create a beautiful image on your own hands!

Coloring by numbers is quite simple even for small kids. We choose a lot of pretty images in pixel art which can be liked by children e.g. kids can color a unicorn or any animals.
There are a lot of easy images for kids. Also, many pixel images for adults are available too. For example, you can color a unicorn or an astronaut.
Please, rate our coloring app ColorPix! It’s very important for us because your reviews highly motivate us to improve the coloring pages 2018!

comments: It's okay and the graphics are really nice, the sound effects are good but ultimately, you play and play and play and play and still not got to the other towns. I've got to about the 7th and had enough of trying to get further and not progressing much. It's okay for a few days but after that, and like someone else has mentioned about the ads, too many to get little rewards

Really fun and adictingl but for samsung galaxy core prime this game has A LOT of bugs and glitches. Tried to play for more than five minutes is making the phone first freeze the screen then restart itself. Some cabs never arrive. Need a lot of bugfixes right now. Other than that it is a good game that i like.

For a game so heavily reliant on ads to deliver benefits to the player, it is a gamble sometimes whether or not those ads will crash the game and therefore cost you the prizes. The game itself is all right, but this gamble drags down the experience when it doesn't work.

It's like owning your own transportation service like Uber or Lyft, but in arcade Crazy Taxi meets Monopoly. If you hire drivers to your service, you not only make more money, but you expand your  territory. I love the diversity of the characters, how you have new with the classic arcade characters like Axel, Gus and Gena. And I also love the concept is modern, but has the classic arcade concept and feel with the scratch cards, gems, and money. Bonuses are earned through accomplishing objectives, and of course, ads. Thanks Sega. 👌👍❤

Outstanding game. My only fuss is cars get trapped in some buildings during attempts to retrieve funds. Going back to another stage and returning to the stage I'm engaged in usually resets game play. Otherwise, great game.

It's a chilled game to play. There are a bit too many ads. And it because it is just tapping, it can be a bit boring after a while. It takes long before you get somewhere new. But all by all it's a free easy game to kill time perfectly.

comments: Ok, so I will be calm in this review. Whenever I have the same car in a battle with red, we ram each other, but they push me off the map with ease. The main reason why I wrote a review for this game is that you should make the alien levels a little easier. The last level for it is way too hard, you can barely aim at the boss. The controls are hard too. Also can you optimize the game for the Samsung Galaxy tab A?

I would have given this game a higher review than three that I have given it, the problem is that I have noticed a problem when trying to save some money. For me at least when trying to save money through the daily giveaway/present of playing the game everyday it has stolen money from me discreetly whenever I get around the 1000 coin mark sometimes it is one hundred sometimes I have lost 400 with no explanation as to where the money is. It is for this reason that I have lowered my rating. (Besides the disappearing money I enjoyed the game.)

This game is pretty good, for the most part. The only problem is the bots you go upagainst are  way to hard. I can never win. I would have gave them 5 stars but I gave them 4 stars because of the bots. And the game is kinda hard to control. When I move backwords on a veichel it goes up.

Good for killing time. Some of the computer driven opponents seem to have a very decisive advantage at initial start of certain stages, and some of the smaller vehicles are too sensitive on the controls  but overall decent game.
New update stucks a lot and 1st time my mobile hangs a lot due to this game and btry drains faster than ever. plz crt these mistakes to continue njoying this game
This game needs major fixes, on mission mode, I get my reward after completing a level but I can't ever go anywhere after it. So I never get to move on the next level. 😒
description: Drive Ahead! is a gladiator car fight. Wreck your friends by knocking their helmets with a variety of cars from monster trucks to alien saucers! Hundreds of cars and levels bring endless hours of helmet-crashing action and freak accidents!You can play Drive Ahead! in four game modes. Battle your friends in two-player matches in local multiplayer on the same device or over WiFi! Explore stadium missions featuring dinosaurs, aliens and robots! Reduce the unworthy to wrecks and reign supreme in King of the Hill! Share your best Superstar Stadium replays for a shot at featuring inside the game! Will you be the next Drive Ahead superstar?!Customize your battles or go random for crazy matchups! Can you best a monster truck with a go-kart? Hiding won't help - sudden death brings sawblades, rain of fire and flash floods. The only defense is ruthless offense!Collect virtual credits and use them in the Prize Machine to unlock tons of cars and loads of arenas as you play!We would love to hear your feedback. You can email us at driveahead [at] dodreams [dot] com or follow us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/DriveAheadGame). Here is our Privacy Policy: http://dodreams.com/pdf/dodreams_policy.pdf.Are you enjoying Drive Ahead? Help us make more fun games like this by rating and reviewing it!
descriptionHTML:
Drive Ahead! is a gladiator car fight. Wreck your friends by knocking their helmets with a variety of cars from monster trucks to alien saucers! Hundreds of cars and levels bring endless hours of helmet-crashing action and freak accidents!

You can play Drive Ahead! in four game modes. Battle your friends in two-player matches in local multiplayer on the same device or over WiFi! Explore stadium missions featuring dinosaurs, aliens and robots! Reduce the unworthy to wrecks and reign supreme in King of the Hill! Share your best Superstar Stadium replays for a shot at featuring inside the game! Will you be the next Drive Ahead superstar?!

Customize your battles or go random for crazy matchups! Can you best a monster truck with a go-kart? Hiding won't help - sudden death brings sawblades, rain of fire and flash floods. The only defense is ruthless offense!

Collect virtual credits and use them in the Prize Machine to unlock tons of cars and loads of arenas as you play!

We would love to hear your feedback. You can email us at driveahead [at] dodreams [dot] com or follow us on Facebook (https://www.facebook.com/DriveAheadGame). Here is our Privacy Policy: http://dodreams.com/pdf/dodreams_policy.pdf.

comments: Look, I understand that you have to make money somehow, and ads are how you make money on a free game. But these ads are way too frequent and obnoxious. I listen to podcasts while playing games and every minute or so my sound cuts out completely to prioritize the ad. Earn the ad by giving me a decent amount of playtime before it and stop overriding my audio.

Well i would give this five stars but you cant watch an add to get a power up! And you should lower the ad mount of adds i cant go in for 10 seconds without an add popping up!! Overall good great game
Way too many ads after every time I lose or go onto another level an advert pops up. Verry annoying. But the gameplay is decent.

I like the game itself but when you have 3 adds coming up after one game you hardly can enjoy the game. Super annoying, so if you download it for free be prepared to buy it otherwise it will drive you crazy!
What's with the annoying adverts? Why they seem to go on forever? FFS way too many.. Uninstalled... Get rid of the fcukin' ads and I'd play this game til the end! I really would.
It is so fun I love it he is so cute and if you lose the cheese he gets so sad he sinks like a puddle but still so fun some levels are easy some are middle some are hard but not all good luck to you

comments: All in all it is a really great game there are very few ads, its fun, the graphics are crisp. Its amazing except for one thing. On one of the levels all of the monsters have exactly 666 health and im not religious or anything but I'm pretty sure that if some one who is religious see's that, well lets just say that it might not be good for the company, so I suggest you fix this.  Thanks.

It stopped working on my One plus! Help! I was excited about the side games! *********************************** Excellent, addictive fun. I reached shield 135 (level 1154) and it doesn't level up any more. Gutted! Still a great game but so sad I can't progress any more. No reason why really! Incidentally, good for helping kids with Mathematics.

Is this game for You? Do you enjoy spending most of the game watching ads? Do you enjoy games that make it impossible to play without spending real money? Do you enjoy being grabbed by the crotch so hard you change genders?  If you answered yes or no to any of these then no this game is not for you. It's nothing but a crappy game designed to rake in as much money as possible, rather than making something fun. Forced to watch 30 second ads after each round. Forced to use the currency you earn when you don't want too. Enemy power will suddenly jump up 10 fold making spells and goldimpossible to gain without watching an addition 30 second ad. Even if you win and get the key you are forced to watch a 30 sec ad to unlock as if you didn't get a key.

Concept and gameplay is ok, but, like others have said, there are way too many ads. Also the special spells you can unlock are given to you at random. Have a aituation that drill would be great for? Too bad take explosion.

Fun game but takes forever to get gold to upgrade. The cost to pay for the gems to buy so you can buy gold is really expensive. Not much dynamic to the game. Same stuff on each level just takes longer to bet enemies cause of higher HP.

This game is really good.  The more you play the harder it gets but it is doable and you can watch ads to get you trough without paying.  I am around level 35 & haven't spent anything.  It is a hard to put down game.  The visuals are super satisfying,  especially when you get your little bombs kicking butt on the upper side of the enemy and they get faster and faster.  So satisfying!
description: Looking for a way to enter the world of magic? Well then look no further than Bounzy! - the newest title by Gram Games. You’re a mage, facing an onslaught of fantastic beasts. Using your mystic powers, fight them back, and protect your town. As your spells strike the beasts, they will lose health - just make sure they’re fully vanquished before they reach you. Each attack you stave off will reward you with a chest. Destroy all enemies to find its key and unlock valuable diamonds and gold, which you can use to improve your strength and skill.The more powerful your spells, and the stronger your defenses, the more likely you are to succeed. Visit the laboratory to build the strength of your spells. Venture into the academy to learn special spells that will help you to defeat the enemies. And make sure to maintain the strength of your wall - these beasts have a knack for breaking through faulty barriers.Think you can protect your town? Try Bounzy! today.

descriptionHTML:
In the pursuit of Street Chasing Speed Racing, want to be the top racing hero, a top sports car is essential!

Join in the Street Chasing Speed Racing, bring you immersive real racing game experience!

Real dream car show, varies top sports cars are waiting for you to choose!

Game Features:
◆ More than 18 top sellers on the market, sports car you choose to come and upgrade the car to play their potential it;
◆ Real game sound, the real engine sound recorded by high-fidelity technology, fully meet your sensory needs;
◆ More than 80 professional leagues, drive your car to conquer every track;
◆ 4 seasons, spring race, summer race, autumn race, winter race; each season is full of passion;
◆ Adapt to all Android devices above Android 4.0;
◆ No WiFi, no problem.

Gameplay:

◆ Click on the left and right buttons on the screen, or tilt the phone to control the car turning around;
◆ Click accelerator, consumption of nitrogen, into super acceleration mode;
◆ Click the brake button, brake;
◆ Click the brake button, while pressing the arrow keys, you can drift, drift can accumulate nitrogen;
◆ Collected the bottle of nitrogen on the road.

So, are you ready to start this exciting racing experience now?

See these luxury cars, you will definitely can’t help driving them to crush opponents!

Car racing in the city is a very exciting experience, beyond the opponent, you also need to avoid vehicles on the road!

comments: Everything was great except in the beginning it kept saying I didn't find any mice but I found them twice on the first one.. but then I restarted it and it worked fine.. until it kept freezing and I had to restart my tablet.. after doing that like 5 times it worked great thru out the whole game.. I kinda felt like it was a lot shorter then the other games. But other then that I had fun playing it and I'm super excited for other to come out so hurryyy!!!!!!! Lol

This is just like the other game you guys made, the one with the doctor in the hospital, down to the exact same thing of "play the first couple of levels for free but if you like you pay" I bet this one is for the same price. On a side note, the story is different but the game play is the same, go have a look if you want. I will say this is a good game and I take nothing away from the hard work you have done. Good looking graphics, good smooth game play. A game you can get into and do try the other games of this developers you may like it as well. Over all a good game I just do not think it is worth $15. But best of luck guys.

description: Help rookie detective Parker solve cases and bring criminals to justice!In Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice, a streak of murders plagues the city. Become a homicide detective and restore law and order in this unique crime investigation game!Lily Parker is a smart and righteous detective who works hard to put criminals behind bars and make the world a better place, even if her own life is a mess. Victor Lane is a smug but charming criminal defense attorney who doesn’t care who he’s defending as long as he’s getting paid. He’s also the best at his job.When some of the criminals Lane defended in the past start dying, Parker’s forced to work with him to find the culprit. Could it be one of the criminal’s victims? Or perhaps some kind of vigilante? Is Lane himself being targeted?Immerse yourself in the first episode of an exciting time management story game, feel the thrill of the chase and prove that your detective skills are second to none! Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice is waiting for you.🕵️‍♀️ Help expose the hidden killer before another victim falls!🔎 Look for evidence while investigating 9 different locations🕵️‍♀️ Master 18 mini games based on forensic investigation🔎 Examine clues and analyze objects using forensic techniques🕵️‍♀️ Play through 60 extraordinary story levels and 30 extra challenge levels🔎 Complete your case file by collecting diamonds🕵️‍♀️ Conquer daily challenges to earn extra diamonds for your case file🔎 Beat your high score with a choice of 15 awesome endless levelsTry the first few levels for free! To access the full game, you can either unlock everything with an in-app purchase, or continue playing the free version with ads.Follow Parker & Lane on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Heart's Medicine and Fabulous: https://goo.gl/SXb8sa
descriptionHTML:
Help rookie detective Parker solve cases and bring criminals to justice!

In Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice, a streak of murders plagues the city. Become a homicide detective and restore law and order in this unique crime investigation game!

Lily Parker is a smart and righteous detective who works hard to put criminals behind bars and make the world a better place, even if her own life is a mess. Victor Lane is a smug but charming criminal defense attorney who doesn’t care who he’s defending as long as he’s getting paid. He’s also the best at his job.

When some of the criminals Lane defended in the past start dying, Parker’s forced to work with him to find the culprit. Could it be one of the criminal’s victims? Or perhaps some kind of vigilante? Is Lane himself being targeted?

Immerse yourself in the first episode of an exciting time management story game, feel the thrill of the chase and prove that your detective skills are second to none! Parker & Lane – Criminal Justice is waiting for you.

🕵️‍♀️ Help expose the hidden killer before another victim falls!
🔎 Look for evidence while investigating 9 different locations
🕵️‍♀️ Master 18 mini games based on forensic investigation
🔎 Examine clues and analyze objects using forensic techniques
🕵️‍♀️ Play through 60 extraordinary story levels and 30 extra challenge levels
🔎 Complete your case file by collecting diamonds
🕵️‍♀️ Conquer daily challenges to earn extra diamonds for your case file
🔎 Beat your high score with a choice of 15 awesome endless levels

Try the first few levels for free! To access the full game, you can either unlock everything with an in-app purchase, or continue playing the free version with ads.

Follow Parker & Lane on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/GameHouseOriginalStories/

Download the GameHouse Original Stories app and enjoy other amazing games like Delicious, Heart's Medicine and Fabulous: https://goo.gl/SXb8sa

comments: I used to love this game, very addictive but recent updates have made the game have too many elements (clubs - who cares???) Ads all over and money disappears quickly due to cost of each game.  Not easy to complete games it feels "fixed" with random cards plus drains the battery on my phone.  Uninstalled.

This is my 3rd review. Love the game but had issues when ads were introduced. That was rectified, then had issues with new Android version. That was fixed and game was going fantastically for about 3 weeks and now they have reduced the amount of free treasure to $1000 instead of $5000. This means I need to come back 3x more often without playing a single game just to be able to play once.

I would like it more if in the perk levels it showed how many club points were needed for each level and how many more are needed to finish the perk level. The green filling up the bar doesn't really accurately show how close you are. It looks like you are almost done, but then it takes forever to fill up so you don't know how many more points you need.

This game has many issues! It continually freezes and shuts me down. I can no longer play on my tablet, which I purchased just for games, and have to use my phone. I don't like using my phone because it drains my battery. I am so ready to quit this game and return to candy crush instead. Latest updates have rendered JP and other perks useless.

Originally I really liked this game BUT the further you go the  more it costs to play.  That was ok, but you add more and more ads in there, they are on the "boards" they are between the games, between the levels and NOW you have Tri Peaks Solitaire brought to you by, yet another game. I like it, as a game it's addictive and was  fun but I think I have had enough.  It's becoming not so much fun and headed for the uninstall list.

I don't know if a review is still available  after a game has been deleted. The game was fun to play I'll say that. I didn't need 5 push notifications coming @ me in the middle of the night however. The one that came through @ 3:17 a.m. was it for me, I'm out.

comments: (REAL REVIEW! NOT A PAID REVIEWER) Really enjoying the game. It's a good time killer. Some levels are a lot of fun and actually require a little bit of skill. The only thing keeping me from giving it 5 stars is there are way too many ads. It will randomly make you watch a video to upgrade your ride or character, and/or to play a level. There's been a few times where I had enough tickets to play, and coins to upgrade my character the two points recommended, and I had to watch a video for all three. Three ads before you can even play a level is ridiculous. I understand that it's a big part of making money for the developers, but I've never had a free game with this many ads. Get rid of some of the ads and I'll gladly update my review to 5 stars.
Nice game I love it.it give me energy to play every day .Ilike it so much I never stop playing this game because it simple .This game is relax able when you got a stress
It keeps glitching. And it flips over when i'm not doing it. But sometimes the glitching is good
This game good but it is always adds are coming
I love it and it is easy and hard but great to
Fun game a little too many ads for bonuses
description:
* NOW WITH MULTIPLAYER MODE! *Get ready for some extreme waterslide action in the world’s craziest water park simulator! Survive as long as you can as you perform crazy stunts and blast through everything in your path! Whizz and bounce through rollercoaster-style corkscrews, loops and more! You’ll brave incredible water parks and dominate some seriously insane tracks. This is more than just fun in the sun…Have you got the skills to make it to the finish line in this epic, thrill-filled ride?
TAKE IT TO THE MAXTake the fun to another level when you choose from tons of rad “rides” like bathtubs, sharks, or jet skis, each with their own unique specs. The new multiplayer mode allows you to challenge friends and other uphill rush enthusiasts. Set up races, beat record, collect diamonds to unlock cool upgrades, and use power-ups to give you a boost!
RIDE YOUR WAY IN THE LEVEL EDITORCreate your own levels that can be played by your friends and other players from around the world. They will rate your levels and help you climb to the top of the leaderboard. Of course you can just play other players’ levels too, tons of new ones will be added daily!
SUPER FUN FEATURES:• Amazing new cruise ship world!• Conquer the world’s most dangerous attractions • Experience extreme water park thrills• Perform mind-blowing stunts • Choose from 20+ rides and many different characters and outfits• Master all levels in Level Mode• Survive as long as you can in Endless Mode• Create your own content in the Level Editor• Tons of new levels added every day by the community• Discover hidden diamonds and unlock power-ups• Conquer the global leaderboard• Play anytime, anywhere, no wi-fi needed!
Will you wipe out or will you prove yourself as a water park pro? Jump in now and find out!
  PRIVACY POLICYhttp://www.spilgames.com/mobile-apps-privacy-policy/TERMS OF USEhttp://www.spilgames.com/terms-of-use/

comments: Just way too many ads. Eventually you start having to watch an ad after every second other level. Its a free game, so I get it but the levels are so quick sometimes I'm watching more than I am playing. Fun game, though. Easy controls and great graphics and sound.

Good fun and very addictive. I see people moaning about the adds 😧 but what can you expect from a free game? You get an add pop up after about 5 puzzles and to be honest it is only for a few seconds....just close it if you don't want to see them.

This game is outstanding. Love the graphics, simple to understand. Some appear quite easy and then you suddenly get a level that looks like it should be but has you scratching your head for AGES!!! Love it. I can live with the adverts, just wish i could put the phone down.

Wonderful game, excellent graphics, its a free game, I solve 2 puzzles and a video ad plays I cant get over it, ad's are repeatedly played and I can't skip, but uninstalling cos too too much of ad's... after 2nd level game is very easy didn't find much interesting..

Agree with other comments. Great graphics, fun to play, but the ADS!!!!!!!! eventually destroy the fun. Very repetitive after a while and challenge levels seem quite mixed. Have decided to delete the game mainly because of the ad onslaught. Other games have a much better ad/play psychology approach.
Great time killer and keeps the brain ticking good fun. Ads are annoying but it's free and you can pay about £1.50 to get rid of them if your that bothered 🤔

comments: It is amazing.really keeps you hooked on.. However when it comes to completing the quest, resources get over quickly and as per the time we need to wait for 3hrs for getting the refill,or buy it with the diamonds.... Lower the time limit for resource production like in different expeditions..as that will unable us to play more and complete it too on time.

I like the game, it helps pass time. My only complaint is you make it super hard to do anything without having tonso3ns real money. Which is ridiculous. I get that you need to make money off of this, but don't be so ridiculous about it.

Such a great and fun game but you can't do anything without buying food, money and diamonds with real money. No videos or exchange options. Would have played a lot longer if these options were available instead op purchasing with real money. Such a shame.

Really enjoy the game. Not spent a penny on it yet and managing alright to do tasks etc in a reasonable time. Though I've not completed a quest yet but that could be me not getting back to the game regularly enough. That's my issue though.

It's not my favourite game because resources take FOREVER to get. I cannot spend real money and its expensive to purchase the package. It's so difficult to get diamonds and other resources. Please make it easier to get the needed items for the events.  PLEASE  !
It glitches too much.  To actually beat any islands, you have to spend money.  I think that you should make it possible to play without spending money

comments: Why I liked it? Because it's a simple game that doesn't make you addicted to phone but rather enjoy going forward focusing your attention entirely on your finger. What comes to music as I read in comments, I always play games without music so haven't listened to this game's. I play this game as a reward after working hard and I'm entirely satisfied. There have been no crashes so far. Lots of ads, though.

I mean the game in itself is......alright  it could be a lot better.  I think the controls are rubbish and I understand it's meant to be "skillfull" but thats harder than skillfull, you can't even see where the circle is, this also adds to the game being bad. Having said all this you have also added rubbish music..... like you could have put something decent on. I get even more of an urge to uninstall the game every time I play it. Overall I definitely do NOT recommend this game. Game developers I hope you read this as it will probably help you to make the game better. I understand it would take a while but I don't care. If any of the game developers want to feedback on my feedback you are welcome to.Thank you.
This is game is ok if you are bored and don't know what to do.... however it becomes irritating after playing for a while.... overall its a nice game
I would like to report a bug. When you pause the game, moving obstacles keep moving. Someone would use this as a cheat
This is the best game to relax. But i have a problem i do i change the music there are some music that i like and i want only that to play so i request ro put a music option  Thank you

It is impossible to pass and the controls where do I start the ball goes tooooooo fast and it's impossible I don't recommend to download this game. But if u want to download it (which u won't). DON'T DOWNLOAD THIS GAME. Bye.

The AI got worse at the same time, so it's not really harder... just more random.  I now find that this game stresses me out instead of helping me relax, so I have to give it up.
This game is really bored! I'm so stress! I lose and second you lose again why Glow Hockey is bored a bored game! But like it. I'm nervous to play because you lose... but I'm happy..
First version was my favourite thing to play but the update looks like a different game entirely. The ball got too small and the physics became stupid and random
Better if you introduce online mode like in 8 ball pool.And disable multiple touches so that if anyone else touch the screen the paddles don't go in his control.THANKS,REST GAME IS GOOOD.

comments: The game is alright. Still too early to give it a proper review. Only here to say that the timers are way too long in the early stages of the game. Waiting an hour or four for thirty seconds of gameplay. They need to work on scaling the progression timers. A game like this is okay with long timers in late game when you have more than one thing to keep track of. But for these pay to win games to be profitable it helps to bait the hook a little harder before making you wait hours for more content.

This game is a solid mix of "clash of clans" and "fallout shelter". Just like COC, you have to learn to let the timers cool off. The long term time investment can be very rewarding. The questing/pvp is also well done considering you can't choose what to attack or when during battle. Wholeheartedly a good game.

GG easy. everyone whining being pay to play this that. i never bought anything and I'm loving this, just need a little patience and you can do many things untill one thing gets done or upgraded. I'm high in ranks, have a clan dedicated to non buyers. its all cool. been over 4 months and i still play this its amazing! great work guys, keep it up and keep adding new stuff.

I love the game.  The thing is, this game just gets boring.  For example,  all you can do right now is to vanquish invasions. That's basically it. The portal is not always open.  The tournament? Well the match ups are way too oblivious.  My in game friends already have started quitting coz of these problems. You have to add something fun soon. Well it is still a fun game tho.

Would be a great game if it wasn't blatantly pay to win.  Everything in the game is designed to push you to pay.  I enjoyed it at first and usually toss about $15 since it was decent.   But then, the system pairs you with opponents you can't defeat which then hampers your progress greatly which then means you either pay or hope you don't get attacked too much and lose all your resources.

Been playing since early access relese. Game is very well built. But like all other games. The ads now bugged. The daily quest for the ad has never worked for me. Starts ad restarts app no credit. Oh well its an ad right. Well now your forcing me to watch them. Please fix So can i atleast finish those 2 daily quest?!?!?!  Also since update my androids menu buttons overlay all buttons on far right/left hand of screen depending on tilt. Phone is an LG stylo 3. Please address and i will rerate later.
description: Become the lord and master of a real medieval castle! Accept new subjects, assign them to their duties, train and protect your men and women! Defy your rivals and laws of physics as you build and upgrade your fortress! Your pudgy warriors look great in their shining armor! Nourish and train your troops, and they’ll crush the armies of Grav the Mighty Brainpan, find the shelter of the fearsome OM-NOM, put the Abyss Lord back in his place, and also burn down a couple of enemies’ castles! All day long your scribes scratch their heads with quills, treasurers spill coins on the floor and blacksmiths drop anvils on their feet for the sake of your prosperity! Prepare true specialists, become wealthy and influential! Build a dating room and watch your subjects have children who’ll soon grow up and serve you too! Assume command, my lord! Here are some of the opportunities you get in the game: - Story-driven campaign. In hundreds of missions your heroes fight orcs, giants, skeletons and even dragons! Battle magic, cold steel and cunning strategy – the end justifies the means! - Castle construction. Build new rooms for your stronghold and upgrade the existing ones. You’ve got all you need to create a dream castle! Begin the construction now! - Developing the villagers. Each of your subjects can learn new skills and wear any equipment. Train great warriors and scribes… and then swap them with each other! - Multiplayer. Get medieval! Burn and plunder the castle of someone you don’t like… And you don’t like all of them, right?We are now working on:- Clans: Join an exciting cooperative gameplay! Create clans together with other players, talk in chat, develop you kingdoms, train your champions, conquer territories and dominate other kingdoms.- Portals and mazes: even more options to earn unique chests with precious rewards. New enemies, new bosses and new territories!- Caravans: if you are tired of war, go into business!- The extension of the storyline campaign: get to the chief villain and triumph over the universal evil!- Collections and unique heroes- Daily log-in bonuses- The improvement of the visual elements of the game- The optimization and balance of the game process- Performance improvementsAll of these and many other innovations are waiting for you in the upcoming updates!

comments: I love this game. Amazing sound effects, graphics. You guys did a great job that's for sure! But still couldn't give it a five star because of the lastest update. The entire screen goes black after playing the game for 5-6 minutes. That's pretty irritating not to mention how much slower the phone gets as well. Didn't have these issues with the last update. Fix it please!

I've been on Township since 2015 and I absolutely love it. Its the first game I play in the morning and the last one I play at night. This game has so much personality. From the characters to the animals, it is by far the best game that I've played so far. Keeps me busy for hours and I recently got my boyfriend hooked, keeps him as busy as it does myself. I don't have any complaints about it. Thank you GPG for coming up with a game so super fantastic. Kudos to the developers.

This game needs the ability to gain more township cash. I have spent way too much real money to buy township cash and im not doing so again at this rate. Farmville isnt this bad and hard to expand.  You cant expand the barn without waiting on products by train or paying in township cash to expand. And that costs over a couple hundred township cash for each expansion. Getting a dollar or two here and there takes forever to collect. Plus the expansion makes small expansions so it doesnt help much.   If something dont change i may quit the game. I enjoy it and would like to continue but at this rate i dont see much point. I cant afford to pay more money to play.

Fantastically animated time-killer, very detailed and interesting to watch when you actually do pay attention to the stuff that happens around a well designed town. The co-op portion of the gameplay is just enough social interaction that I like in games like this. It isn't forced. Nothing really is, and that is rare for games like this. Keep them coming, I'm enjoying them!

The Best!  But not Great my suggestion is please add an option to chat your friends privately this is important!.  Also add an option to search anyone by their township name so we can easily adding them.. Last one add an option to change your profiles photo from our gallery if you can~ instead of using our Facebook photos or township original photos.. Please make it happen

Great game very addictive, and I don't know if I just found the right Co-op or what but the team work on this game is amazing. I love my little town although, 😒 you need to be able to expand faster! I have NO ROOM for any more buildings, and they want me to expand my population so I can add more buildings. Thats's kind of ridiculous. That's the only bad thing I have to say about this game.
description: Township is a unique blend of city-building and farming! Build your dream town! Harvest crops at the farms, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with exotic countries. Open restaurants, cinemas, and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world.Are you ready to become a farmer and city-manager to build your dream? descriptionHTML:
Township is a unique blend of city-building and farming!

Build your dream town! Harvest crops at the farms, process them at your facilities, and sell goods to develop your town. Trade with exotic countries. Open restaurants, cinemas, and other community buildings to give life in your town special flavor. Explore the mine to get resources and find ancient artifacts. Run your own zoo and collect animals from around the world.
Are you ready to become a farmer and city-manager to build your dream? Let’s get started!

Township features:
● Different buildings and decorations you can use to create your dream town
● Various crops to grow and later process at your factories
● Fun, charismatic townspeople with orders you need to fill
● Your town's mine packed with ancient artifacts to discover and collect
● Lovely animals to take care of
● Farms to manage and expand
● Exotic goods brought from islands
● A zoo to build where you can even breed animals
● Country flags and famous landmarks you can use to decorate your town, like the Statue of Liberty, Big Ben, and many more!
● Play with your Facebook and Google+ friends, make new friends in the game community create your own clans!

Township is free to play, though some in-game items can also be purchased for real money.

*Internet connection is required to play the game and enable social interactions, competitions and other features*

Enjoying Township? Learn more about the game!

Really like the game! Addicting.  Why can't I play level 111 and up? Fix this and and add more levels please!
It goes from easy to hard pretty fast and then starts spamming ads one after another. I'm fine with ads but not a barrage of them.
Lags way to much no matter what all it does is skip and I just wasted my time
I think it is fun just to hard, and I think they should cut down on the add but gameplay needs work.
I like this game but after playing 15 levels I have to wait for 1 day to play next 15 levels
description: Draw as many lines or polygons as needed to gradually make the ball fall into the U. Both the ball and the lines react to the law of gravity. Beware not to trap the ball inside a group of lines! This educational game features 18 physics problems to solve. If you get stuck, click on the restart button. Physics Drop is a fun way of practising physics... download it and try!

comments: Such a Blast to Play. App never seems to grow boring like some other games. Also the apps not constantly hounding you to spend on Upgrades and Advances which is nice. Your character jumps higher, flips and twirls faster as U advance further. I play it once or twice a day at least. All in All a great/fun app....ENJOY !!

Since the last update, being able to double up on coins from hourly balloons is impossible.  Also watching videos for coins isn't working.  This game is great when everything works right.  However, it is getting frustrating not being able to view videos for coins.  I'm game ad breaks are still working, so what's the deal?  The # 1 thing that keeps me in a game is not having to spend real money.  I a star simply because of this.  Fix it please.

In this game once you have all of the flips it gets really boring. Also there are way to many ad breaks. This game was really fun but now that it's newer it's boring. It lags to much and kicks me out. I give this 1 star

No matter how hard I tried, I would end up crashing on my head.  Round would end, and it would ask if you wish too see an ad.  Expect that after every round. Even if you say no, it will do an ad break every 3 rounds.  I wanted to enjoy this game, but it was not challenging, and so many ads that I uninstalled it.

Ads ads and more ads. And really pushy ads that you can't just close straight away too. You spend more time watching ads than playing the game, and honestly you can't advance in the game without watching ads for coins anyway, so it's basically an advertisement with a mini game in between. Scummy sell out app.

This game is great but I would only rate it a five if there were less adds. Every game I play, as soon as I finished it said "add break". This is very annoying as the adds are up to 30 seconds long. Please get rid of them.

comments: Overall the game itself is pretty good and worth the download for a good couple hours of fun even with a few friends. However I would highly recommend not spending any money on the in game purchases. I got ripped off, luckily with in game currency only and the "game team" is adamant that nothing went wrong. If that is the type of support they give I wouldn't want something to go wrong with my actual money. So long story short as long as u don't spend money u should have a good time playing

I give 1star not because that game isn't game is awesome I give 1 star because of support team. I tried many time to contact them to short out my problem but they don't reply. My problem is my trophy points are above 1500 but I always find a enemy with 900 points and it takes more than 1minute to find a enemy please guys tell me what do I do it is so frustrating I can't take it anymore

It was fun....a year ago! Now I can't trash 🖕This bad joke of a game enough,  HARDCORE🖕 Gameaftergameaftergameaftergameaftergameaftergameaftergame No PROGRESSION, To be underleveled,  To be overmatched, to be cheated, to be robbed, To be lied to! To be insulted & ignored,  & To be taken for a fool😤BUT most importantly........TO BE UNINSTALLED 😋!

This had already been done much better. This game allows you to play about 30 minutes before you need to shell out money to compete. Not interested in these crooked games. When are we going to get back to some honesty and not trying to screw customers to get rich?

It's awesome game with wonderful grafics. First I thought it's an exact copy of clash of Royale but when I started to play this game I thought that clash of Royale is a worst game. My suggestion is don't waste your 94mb while downloading clash of Royale better use 94mb +2mb =96mb for downloading this miracle and a wonderful game Castle Crush.🏰🏰🏯🏯🏰🏰🏯🏯

Love the game defiantly 5* just a couple of comments I hope get read it would be nice to gain some coins through friendly battles with people in your clan. Also if you could see when your group member's were last active it would be easier to sort out our clans. Thanks

comments: GAH! They've over complicated this game with unnecessary graphics and gifts and prizes etc. I couldn't even figure out how to get into the levels for a while haha. I'm sure if I had the patience to go through and understand it properly it would be fine, but I didn't want to. Old angry birds setup was better. Wish you didn't change it. Uninstalled after 1 day.

I really think the tower is rigged. 1 in 4 chance of getting the pig but it seems to happen ALL the time. Cant get past the 6th or 7th floor. However if you spend lots o money to buy gems I guess it can be done. Not for me I am out.

Can no longer watch ads to get an extra rewards chest plus, I logged in for 90 days and did not get my legendary chest. My screen froze up when I hit the claim button and had to restart my game. Now my chest is gone and the next level has appeared without me being able to chose what I wanted from the chest.

Caution! Needed access to my personal files including photos to play the game.  I denied and could not start the game unless it had access. Uninstalling after this review.  Don't let programmers and hackers get a hold of your personal files!

Graphics are good, game play can be lame at times when you get birds that are incapable of completing the level. You can't buy the game and that bothers me. I spent $20, (to support the effort) but am trying to keep it at that.  Others have spent $100 and more. Greed ruins this game. Just finished a level that was designed to be beat only by spending money. Spent hours trying but finally paid and beat it. The game play is not consistent. If you have a bad day it will let you win, if you're winning, suddenly an opponent that should never be able to beat you, kicks your ass when you've played perfectly.

It won't let me watch videos. Every time I click on the TV to watch a video for a free bird or arena ticket, it restart the game instead and I lose a life. I hope this gets fixed because other then that it's an addictive game. When the Glitch is fixed I will give a better rating.
description: Join hundreds of millions of players for FREE and start your Angry Birds slingshot adventure now! Team up with your friends, gather in clans and take on challenges and events in the all new game modes. Are you ready to evolve your birds and show your skills in the most daring Angry Birds game out there?CHOOSE YOUR BIRD!It’s the ultimate slingshot strategy – YOU choose which bird to fling next! “But that makes it easier, right?” WRONG! You’ll need to choose wisely if you’re going to stop those eggs from getting scrambled. Plus, destroy blocks to fill up the Destruct-O-Meter and earn extra birds!NEW MULTI-STAGE LEVELS!You’ve never seen Piggy Island like this – jaw-droppingly stunning levels brimming with exotic plants, quirky details and plenty of peril. And because those naughty porkies are building their teetering towers right under your beak, many levels have multiple stages. Uh oh.SPECTACULAR SPELLS!Blizzards, Hot Chilis, Golden Ducks and other outrageous spells give you an added advantage against those swindling swine. And when you need some serious help, guess who’s at hand to make a pork-smashing cameo? That’s right, it’s the sardine loving Mighty Eagle. Oh yeah!CHALLENGE OTHER PLAYERS!Challenge players from across the world in the Arena to see who’s the most hardcore bird flinger of them all. Play new tournaments every day, earn feathers to level up your birds and face off against the toughest competition on the planet. Game face!DEFEAT BOSS PIGGIES!There’s some serious bad guys on Piggy Island, and your slingshot skills are needed to take them down. Foreman Pig, Chef Pig and the infamous King Pig will stop at nothing to keep your eggs. Are you gonna let ‘em get away with that? It’s time to teach the pork a lesson.-----------------------------Discover:https://www.angrybirds.com/Follow:https://www.facebook.com/angrybirdshttps://twitter.com/AngryBirds-----------------------------Angry Birds 2 is completely free to play, but there are optional in-app purchases available. Either way, get ready to rain destruction on those swindling swine!This game may include:- Direct links to social networking websites that are intended for an audience over the age of 13.- Direct links to the internet that can take players away from the game with the potential to browse to any web page- Advertising of Rovio products and also products from third partiesThis game may require internet connectivity and subsequent data transfer charges may apply. comments: It remains a classic, yet some parts are just too screwed up. After paying to remove the ads, the ad hoes with the play button still show up. The vase breaker was my favourite in the past. Now it is broken. 65% of the time ir reads actap like a double tap making it utterly unplayable

It was good but then this happened. I was playing just like any other day. My phone had died while I was playing, so I charged it and left it untouched for about an hour or two. When I signed in, all off my progress was erased! Please respond and tell me what happened.

The game was great than EA got to it with there sticky fingers and put adds everywhere, it isn't the same game I enjoyed ages ago. It's just another add infested game now, even if you do pay for it l. The charm is gone

Irritating. At first it gives you an option of playing a video to receive additional help. Which works only for the first time. Next time onwards no way to cancel the video in case you don't want to install it. It is so frustrating. Either allows to cancel or tell the users what to do next. Worst way of promoting other apps.
Why ask people to pay to have ads removed and still have so many features that you need to watch ads for? It just seems like a rip off to me very disappointed in this purchase

I had to update it so I did and when I wanted to play after that, it says "watch video to get extra seed slot" WHICH I ALREADY PAID FOR WITH THE COINS I COLLECTED ALL THESE TIMES. Even before the update, it has so many ads but this is much worse. Definitely not happy with the update.
