description: The ultimate VR Roller Coaster experience. NEW & UPDATED version: one of the most popular VR games just got even better with 3D fantasy ride & alien music ride!Samsung Galaxy S8 (+) users please make sure to enable WQHD+ resolution for the best experience. Settings > Display > Screen resolution > WQHD+ > APPLYThis game features multiple Virtual Reality (VR) Roller Coaster rides. You're ultimate attraction / theme park VR app is one install click away. Download it now for free.VR no gyroscope?No worries we got you covered. If you have a device without any gyroscope sensor please tilt your head left or right to rotate the view. You do not control the vr rollercoaster, but can view 360 degrees during you ride.Multiple ridesWhy settle for one roller coaster if you can enjoy many? Swing by your very own roller coaster park and going to be like being the tycoon of your own theme park and picking your own roller coaster ride when ever you feel like it!The rides come in different tastes and thrill level from all over the world. Pick a more classic cedar roller coaster edition or take the fastest high speed crazy ride and discover at what point you'll get queasy.We offer both recorded 360 videos of real rollercoaster rides and NEW an amazing interactive 3D roller coaster ride in a fantasy world that will make your jaw drop!The 360 video rides come from real life footage making this a roller coaster simulation that is as real as any simulator can get. So download this free VR game now and have your own attraction park in your pocket when ever you feel like taking a roller coaster for a spin. Experience the roller coaster racing down the track at top speed in full 360 VR.Latest ridesNew in the 2017 a ground breaking new 3D VR roller coaster ride that interacts with live music. The all new Alien Music Ride puts you an a both relaxing and high speed ride that interacts and visualizes music. The track has fast ans slow sections and the blend into the environment makes it feel like taking a wingsuite our for a drive on a alien planet. Musically speaking your going to love this as you can first pick a genre including Pop, R&B, or Dance en then start your ride aligned with the music. Please note that where the ride mentions 3D in the top corner of the tile the ride will offer a true 3d experience, as where it mentions Video the ride will be streamed through online video which requires an online Internet connection.CompatibilityThe VR app is optimized for Android mobile phones and the use of Google Cardboard. We aim to support cheap and high-end devices. If you have issues correctly displaying the ride on your headset please first check if you enabled the Cardboard setting for your device correctly. You can usually scan a QR code to automatically enable the setting for your headset. Our known compatibility includes:  VRTX One, Stooksy, VR KiX, Durovis Dive, Merge VR, Refugio 3D, ANTVR, VR Smartview, ColorCross, VRTRIA, FIBRUM VR, VR View-Master, Nibiru. Please contact us if you have any issues.Furthermore you can use this app to enjoy the rides without any VR headset through touch controls as well.If you like VR apps and games, and specifically thrilling VR Roller Coaster rides then this is a must download for you. 5, 4, 3, 2, 1... Get into the VR groove and claim your free VR Roller Coaster now!________________________________Find more on your AR / VR Discovery and join us on social media:- Like us on Facebook- View our videos on YouTube- Follow us on TwitterCopyright 2017-2018 Rabbit Mountain Entertainment Ltd. descriptionHTML:
The ultimate VR Roller Coaster experience. NEW & UPDATED version: one of the most popular VR games just got even better with 3D fantasy ride & alien music ride!

Samsung Galaxy S8 (+) users please make sure to enable WQHD+ resolution for the best experience. Settings > Display > Screen resolution > WQHD+ > APPLY

This game features multiple Virtual Reality (VR) Roller Coaster rides. You're ultimate attraction / theme park VR app is one install click away. Download it now for free.

VR no gyroscope?
No worries we got you covered. If you have a device without any gyroscope sensor please tilt your head left or right to rotate the view. You do not control the vr rollercoaster, but can view 360 degrees during you ride.

Multiple rides
Why settle for one roller coaster if you can enjoy many? Swing by your very own roller coaster park and going to be like being the tycoon of your own theme park and picking your own roller coaster ride when ever you feel like it!
The rides come in different tastes and thrill level from all over the world. Pick a more classic cedar roller coaster edition or take the fastest high speed crazy ride and discover at what point you'll get queasy.
We offer both recorded 360 videos of real rollercoaster rides and NEW an amazing interactive 3D roller coaster ride in a fantasy world that will make your jaw drop!

The 360 video rides come from real life footage making this a roller coaster simulation that is as real as any simulator can get. So download this free VR game now and have your own attraction park in your pocket when ever you feel like taking a roller coaster for a spin. Experience the roller coaster racing down the track at top speed in full 360 VR.

Latest rides
New in the 2017 a ground breaking new 3D VR roller coaster ride that interacts with live music. The all new Alien Music Ride puts you an a both relaxing and high speed ride that interacts and visualizes music. The track has fast ans slow sections and the blend into the environment makes it feel like taking a wingsuite our for a drive on a alien planet. Musically speaking your going to love this as you can first pick a genre including Pop, R&B, or Dance en then start your ride aligned with the music. Please note that where the ride mentions 3D in the top corner of the tile the ride will offer a true 3d experience, as where it mentions Video the ride will be streamed through online video which requires an online Internet connection.

Compatibility
The VR app is optimized for Android mobile phones and the use of Google Cardboard. We aim to support cheap and high-end devices. If you have issues correctly displaying the ride on your headset please first check if you enabled the Cardboard setting for your device correctly. You can usually scan a QR code to automatically enable the setting for your headset. Our known compatibility includes: VRTX One, Stooksy, VR KiX, Durovis Dive, Merge VR, Refugio 3D, ANTVR, VR Smartview, ColorCross, VRTRIA, FIBRUM VR, VR View-Master, Nibiru. Please contact us if you have any issues.
Furthermore you can use this app to enjoy the rides without any VR headset through touch controls as well.

If you like VR apps and games, and specifically thrilling VR Roller Coaster rides then this is a must download for you. 5, 4, 3, 2, 1... Get into the VR groove and claim your free VR Roller Coaster now!

comments: This is a very entertaining game that is simple to play. It has provided me with hours of fun! The only thing is that I wish there were more combinations, there are things I've tried that you'd think would make something but don't. For example, Crayon (or Pencil, or Charcoal, or Paint) + Paper does not make Art.

This game is pretty addicting. I get stuck sometimes but I always find something new.  Small issue though, I it won't let me pull rust out onto the screen for some reason. I've used it before, but now it won't let me use it anymore. Perhaps it is an issue with my phone rather than a glitch in the app.

This is leagues better than the original alchemy game. There were a lot of bugs but they've all more or less been patched out. It took me 2 months of playing everyday to get all of the items and combinations cleared.

The interface is not so good. Big icons are not convenient, we have to scroll down long everytime, I could only imagine how much effort would it take if I had 500 items discovered. Please make icons small or a different tab just for icons or just make it like little alchemy one.

I love this game so much. I'm stuck on trying to make life but it's not frustrating it's challenging and I like it. Also, for all the people getting pissed off because the items disappear and you cant 'use' them anymore it's because you can't combine them with anything anymore so it is put in your encyclopedia so that doesn't waste space for the things you can use, it's actually a very smart game mechanic. I'm pretty sure it even says that in the tutorial. I also like how they didn't take the same combination formulas from the first game and instead added new ways to achieve the same product in a more realistic way, also there is so many items to create! So I think that this is an all around great game. Good job developers. Good job indeed.

I love this game. At first time I open it after download, it still okay. But after that, at second day I open the app, my phone will be turned off immediately. I try to uninstall it and just redownload today, but still same. My phone keep turned off if I open the app. Please fix this, I really really want to play :(

comments: Cute game, but not without it's flaws. I forgot the reasons I deleted the game in the past, but remember them now. It drains your battery, the life refresh time is high (20 minutes) and starting at a certain level (30) you really can't progress WITHOUT friends (this is not a positive for everyone. I personally don't like it), or money, or a ton of patience. You need keys to progress. You can either buy, ask friends, or play for one every FOUR HOURS. This is the exact point where I uninstalled the game last time.

I would taste this game higher if the only way you could progress wasn't by having to purchase extras. Having to waste all my extras to get through a gate with 3 keys sucks and so does knowing that really the only way through is to buy your way through.

I'm uninstalling game! I was really happy with game when I started,  now there is an ad every next life and sometimes more! Same ad over and over, enough to drive you CRAZY! Also you can't answer quick text or do anything off screen without the game totally rebooting,  it's supposed to be relaxing to play on phone,  NOT IRRITATING!

I would give this 5 stars, if you could select a level of difficulty, like easy, medium and hard.  It is not relaxing at all, once you pass the early levels. I hate the levels with bullies, you should be able to skip them.
Was great at first, but is now so slow that it takes around five minutes to load the next level - or just to return to replay a failed level. Shame, as I've stopped playing it because of this fault.

Why bother having an X on the Level Rush notification if it doesn't work so you have to press Begin and wait for the animation to finish before you can carry on with claiming the Daily Challenge. Also 'play with friends' on the tournament never does anything. Otherwise fun.
description: Simon’s Cat in Crunch Time! -  a Match 3 puzzle adventurePublished by Strawdog.The devilish crows have swiped Simon’s Cat’s favourite Tasty Treats and only YOU can help him find them!Join Simon’s Cat, Maisy, Chloe and Jazz, and a cast of determined kitties on a colourful adventure through some pawsome new places where Treats are just waiting to be eaten.Be ready to collect Tasty Treats, fight off big baddies and befriend a host of animal critters in this FREE puzzle game with added CATitude!Simple and addictive puzzle gameplay! Connect the same coloured Treats to make a delicious chain!Play your way through the neighbourhood in six different game modes and hundreds of challenging levels!Challenge your friends! Can you beat your friends purrfect high score?Can you beat the villains? Use your Treats and special boosters to fight off Sir Royston the Pug, Mr Potts, hungry hedgehogs and even a treat crazed vacuum cleaner!Play with Simon’s Cat featuring brand new animationsSimon's Cat is the internet’s most mischievous cat and has become a global phenomenon. Star of over 60 films, which have been watched over 870 million times, and winner of several major industry awards, Simon's Cat has captured the hearts of a worldwide audience.We are working hard to update the game with new levels that are purrfectly crafted and will leave you feline great!
descriptionHTML:
Simon’s Cat in Crunch Time! - a Match 3 puzzle adventure
Published by Strawdog.

The devilish crows have swiped Simon’s Cat’s favourite Tasty Treats and only YOU can help him find them!

Join Simon’s Cat, Maisy, Chloe and Jazz, and a cast of determined kitties on a colourful adventure through some pawsome new places where Treats are just waiting to be eaten.
Be ready to collect Tasty Treats, fight off big baddies and befriend a host of animal critters in this FREE puzzle game with added CATitude!

Simple and addictive puzzle gameplay! Connect the same coloured Treats to make a delicious chain!

Play your way through the neighbourhood in six different game modes and hundreds of challenging levels!

Challenge your friends! Can you beat your friends purrfect high score?
Can you beat the villains? Use your Treats and special boosters to fight off Sir Royston the Pug, Mr Potts, hungry hedgehogs and even a treat crazed vacuum cleaner!
Play with Simon’s Cat featuring brand new animations

Simon's Cat is the internet’s most mischievous cat and has become a global phenomenon. Star of over 60 films, which have been watched over 870 million times, and winner of several major industry awards, Simon's Cat has captured the hearts of a worldwide audience.

We are working hard to update the game with new levels that are purrfectly crafted and will leave you feline great!

description: This baby girl is definitely asking for your professional help in this hairstyle game because either you are prepared to offer it or not you need to play it right away at least to try. First you are going to wash her hair to make it clean and nice, then you'll brush her to get rid of the extra hair, then you will make a nice braided hairstyle to make her happy. But the caring process is more than a simple washing, first you will cut off the damaged hair which has no chance of recovery. Brush the hair as long as the instructions will indicate and just apply the shampoo to offer that extra volume and shine. To prevent the dehydration and the split ends you must put on a special mask for the hair that you will do it yourself. Add the given ingredients, mix them and apply the final composition on the head. Wash the hair again, dry it and arrange the rebel hair yarns. Now all that is left is the braiding part where you will literally gather the hair and place it in the shown spot to get a nice and well arranged headdress. When you are done you can even add a nice head band with beautiful colors and details on it. Have fun and remember to play not only to get better, but to fulfill your inner passion.  You really don't want to miss these cool features presented by this hair styling game:- Free to play- Pretty easy to handle the control- Entertain yourself with quality music and nice graphics- Be a hairstylist as good as you can be in the braided area- Multitude of processes to accomplish- Take care of a dehydrated hair and cut the damaged hair yarns- Put together the strands that needs to be taken for a well executed braid- Moisturize the hair with a home made mask that you are making
descriptionHTML:
This baby girl is definitely asking for your professional help in this hairstyle game because either you are prepared to offer it or not you need to play it right away at least to try. First you are going to wash her hair to make it clean and nice, then you'll brush her to get rid of the extra hair, then you will make a nice braided hairstyle to make her happy. But the caring process is more than a simple washing, first you will cut off the damaged hair which has no chance of recovery. Brush the hair as long as the instructions will indicate and just apply the shampoo to offer that extra volume and shine. To prevent the dehydration and the split ends you must put on a special mask for the hair that you will do it yourself. Add the given ingredients, mix them and apply the final composition on the head. Wash the hair again, dry it and arrange the rebel hair yarns.

Now all that is left is the braiding part where you will literally gather the hair and place it in the shown spot to get a nice and well arranged headdress. When you are done you can even add a nice head band with beautiful colors and details on it. Have fun and remember to play not only to get better, but to fulfill your inner passion.

You really don't want to miss these cool features presented by this hair styling game:
- Free to play
- Pretty easy to handle the control
- Entertain yourself with quality music and nice graphics
- Be a hairstylist as good as you can be in the braided area
- Multitude of processes to accomplish
- Take care of a dehydrated hair and cut the damaged hair yarns
- Put together the strands that needs to be taken for a well executed braid
- Moisturize the hair with a home made mask that you are making

description: Our lovely girl is getting married! She has dreamed about her wedding day since she was a little girl and now the moment has finally come. Enter one of the most elegant wedding games and help the bride and bridesmaids prepare for this special event.Getting ready for a wedding is not easy, it requires some effort and fashion sense. Our wedding game for girls has 4 levels, discover all the things you can do! The bride is going to be the center of attention, you should start with her! Enter the makeup salon and try on lovely shades of lipstick, eyeshadow, eyeliner and mascara. Create a delicate makeup look for the bride to be! After that, visit the hair salon and make sure she gets the perfect hairstyle.The most important part of a bride look is the dress. Enter the wedding dress up level and choose carefully. The dressing room is filled with all types of amazing wedding gowns and you can try all of them before you decide which one looks best on the sweet girl. Whatever you like, you will find it at the wedding fashion salon. Don't forget to pick a nice flower bouquet and a bride veil.The bridesmaids will also need a fashion adviser, don't forget to play dress up with them too. You can pick matching outfits or completely different clothes for each girl. Even though the bride is the most important person at the wedding, the bridesmaids will also need to shine. Do your best as a wedding stylist!Classy Wedding Salon game features:💐 a gorgeous bride and 3 bridesmaids💐 makeup, hair and dress up game levels💐 wedding themed makeup, hairstyles and clothing items (dresses, blouses, skirts and lots of accessories)💐 girly graphics and intuitive gameplay💐 free to play wedding game💐 fun and safe for little girls💐 no wifi gameThe wedding will start soon and these lovely girls need you! Join them right away in one of the most amazing wedding games. Do the bride's makeup, style her hair and find the perfect wedding dress. Then, explore different fashion options with the 3 bridesmaids. You will never get bored of this game for girls, give it a chance and let the fun begin!
descriptionHTML:
Our lovely girl is getting married! She has dreamed about her wedding day since she was a little girl and now the moment has finally come. Enter one of the most elegant wedding games and help the bride and bridesmaids prepare for this special event.

Getting ready for a wedding is not easy, it requires some effort and fashion sense. Our wedding game for girls has 4 levels, discover all the things you can do! The bride is going to be the center of attention, you should start with her! Enter the makeup salon and try on lovely shades of lipstick, eyeshadow, eyeliner and mascara. Create a delicate makeup look for the bride to be! After that, visit the hair salon and make sure she gets the perfect hairstyle.

The most important part of a bride look is the dress. Enter the wedding dress up level and choose carefully. The dressing room is filled with all types of amazing wedding gowns and you can try all of them before you decide which one looks best on the sweet girl. Whatever you like, you will find it at the wedding fashion salon. Don't forget to pick a nice flower bouquet and a bride veil.

The bridesmaids will also need a fashion adviser, don't forget to play dress up with them too. You can pick matching outfits or completely different clothes for each girl. Even though the bride is the most important person at the wedding, the bridesmaids will also need to shine. Do your best as a wedding stylist!

Classy Wedding Salon game features:
💐 a gorgeous bride and 3 bridesmaids
💐 makeup, hair and dress up game levels
💐 wedding themed makeup, hairstyles and clothing items (dresses, blouses, skirts and lots of accessories)
💐 girly graphics and intuitive gameplay
💐 free to play wedding game
💐 fun and safe for little girls
💐 no wifi game

The wedding will start soon and these lovely girls need you! Join them right away in one of the most amazing wedding games. Do the bride's makeup, style her hair and find the perfect wedding dress. Then, explore different fashion options with the 3 bridesmaids. You will never get bored of this game for girls, give it a chance and let the fun begin!
developerAddress: Basarabi 11A, Constanta, Romania
recentChanges: No more bugs and the game is faster than ever. Have fun playing and don't forget to send us your feedback!
summary: Make the bride and her bridesmaids look perfect on the special wedding day!
title: Classy Wedding Salon

comments: This is a wonderful cross stitch app. The picture quality is excellant. Among all apps in the store, this one lets you make  the largest pics from your own. It is  also the most generous option to gain coins. I think the adds blocking colors some reviews mention must depend on your device. I play on 8 in samsung tablet and have no problems. I  have two requests. Would like to play in landscape mode and would like the  ability to turn off the highlighting of the selected color like Cross Stitch world for a little extra challange.

This is my favourite cross stitch game of them all. I love the spin the wheel feature where you can earn bonuses such as gold, protect, etc. I actually don't mind the ads as they offset paying actual money for the patterns if you are a bit "broke" at the time and the import feature is great! Totally addicted.

I love this app. It is very calming and fun BUT there are soooooo many ads. I will raise the rating when you stop having me click/watch so many ads.  Update: there seems to be MORE "+80 coins" ads that block out areas to work in so I eventually HAVE to watch them to get them to go away.

I'm using my Samsung galaxy s7 and I LOVE this app! Such a great time killer, anxiety reducer, stress reducer. You can even upload your own pics! I just wish the spin would land on things other than 60 coins, unpick and shield. There was a day where I got 5 prizes every spin! That was AWESOME!!!

Don't bother playing the mystery ones unless you like cartoon characters. Honestly, it's the last thing I want to see when I'm relaxing after putting 3 kids to bed....more of the same characters that screeched at me all day.

You have to pay if you make a mistake ! You can pay to not ever make a mistake on a single color not all colors just one at a time! I'm sorry but I use recolor and I can change the color anytime!! I wouldn't down load this unless you are a really perfectionist and close to a perfect I'm not sure typer I'm not sure case like it was a mistake!  As I Chuckle! I'm sorry cross sticherz,

comments: Well, I loved the looks of it. Seemed really fun so I downloaded it. Then I spent 30 min downloading the patches, to find out at the very end I didnt have enough space on my phone. Uninstalled as much as I could, and still didn't have enough space... Could have said in details of the game how much space it REALLY takes up... Would have been really nice to know.  -a not so happy consumer

An amazing mmo that really does a great job of handling farming, the game play although has an auto feature still utilizes the controls. The depth of all the items and armor and weapons is awesome. I've been really happy playing this game. The clans are great. The 30 vs 30 opensiege is a nice feature. This game is super fun even for the people that want to play for free. Netmarble does a great job with daily rewards, login bonuses, and events that all allow for players to get great items for free!! Best game I've played in a long while. Only thing is constant crashes and bad story line. The game keeps me turning it back on and I haven't went one day without logging in.

Addicting game with auto-questing and battling. You can choose to do it manually, which I do for boss fights. I don't have to buy anything from the shop, in fact, you get free gear every day! The graphics are amazing for a mobile game with it being an MMO. I have a Note 8, so it does run really well. I play with my monitor using SideSync for full screen awesomeness. There is a lot to do for all types of players, being in a guild doing dungeons reminds me of the old-school MMORPGs of sieging and doing weekly raids.

The game had me hooked as I spent a week trying to find a character and job class I liked. Keep in mind that you will be doing a lot of grinding, but leveling is not surprisingly unreasonable.  There are some aspects that will make you believe you have to pay to win, but it is not necessary. Although it would be cool to help the devs or too. All in all love the game and can't seem to put it down ( I let it auto-grind while I live my life. Haha).

Everything about this game is really good, but since this update today I can't even open the game it keeps closes and sending me to my home screen on my phone... Doesn't give me a error report or any messages just closes the app. Id really like to continue playing please fix . Galaxy S8+

I saw this game and was a little skeptical. Felt like my phone would never handle such a thing if it was as good as it looks, well I'm honestly surprised. Between the nice controls and not having to worry about grinding. To the somewhat intriguing story and overall playability of this game. I'm very impressed. 5/5

"...a must-have for MMORPG fans. 8/10" - PocketGamer


About

Venture into a breathtaking new fantasy world with stunning visuals powered by the Unreal Engine 4. Experience large scale, open-world combat where up to 200 players can battle in real time on a single screen! Party up with strangers or form clans with friends to conquer epic raid dungeons, take down fearsome boss monsters, or compete with thousands of other players around the world in competitive battles.

Lineage 2: Revolution is a groundbreaking, new online role-playing game that brings top-quality visuals, a massive open-world, and large-scale PvP battles to life on mobile devices. Players can finally experience what it truly means to have a gorgeous, fully-featured, persistent world MMORPG that can be enjoyed alongside millions around the world, all within the palm of your hands!

The time has now come for new heroes to rise, to begin a new chapter in history, and to save the world from eternal darkness.

Join the revolution!

▶REAL-TIME MASSIVE BATTLES
Battle other players in thrilling real-time, open-field PvP battles or wage war on an epic scale through competitive 50-vs-50 Fortress Siege matches!

Powered by the Unreal Engine 4, Lineage 2: Revolution pushes the boundaries of what’s graphically possible. Witness never-before-seen graphics on your mobile device!

Explore a vast, stunning, and lush open-world that allows thousands of players to simultaneously explore, discover, and conquer.

description: Mosaic hex puzzle is a creative game which allows you to learn as plays. It enhances mental skills.It helps to develop visual perception skills and hand eye coordination and learn to recognize colors.Mosaic hex puzzle contains two type of board.Each board consist 15+ patterns. descriptionHTML:
Mosaic hex puzzle is a creative game which allows you to learn as plays.
It enhances mental skills.It helps to develop visual perception skills and hand eye coordination and learn to recognize colors.

Mosaic hex puzzle contains two type of board.Each board consist 15+ patterns.
The goal of this game is to copy the selected level reference image by selecting the colorful perler beads from the box and placed it on the right side blank board.
It is easy and fun game.

descriptionHTML:
The thrilling much loved flash game explodes on to mobile.

Moto X3M brings awesome bike racing with beautifully crafted levels straight to your mobile. So grab your motorbike, strap on your helmet and grab some airtime over obstacles and beat the clock on amazing off road circuits.

FEATURES;
-Over 100 challenging stunning levels
-Unlockable super cool Bikes
-Sick stunts and insane tricks as you flip and wheelie through levels
-More high octane levels coming soon
-Timed Levels
-Checkpoints
-User Selected Control scheme

This moto extreme game brings mayhem to your mobile as you race down hill and rev your engine to hill climb to toughest challenges on your way to success. As you race to become the greatest bike racer ever and beat your friends will you be able to handle the explosions and unique obstacles each level provides or will you crash out?

Prefer to feel more connected with your device, try selecting the tilt controls in the pause menu.

comments: The graphics aren't the best and the set up isn't totally comprehensive. Some maps are so zoomed in that it's hard to recognize the general location unless you're already really familiar with geography. It could be more interesting, but the questions are good and it has helped me learn some.

I'm extremely impressed by your app. It is not only fun, but it is the best educational app that has taught me so much! The border outline is the only thing that needs better graphics...otherwise I couldn't be happier!!! (An offline mode would make this app perfect) . Thank you!🙋💯💡👍❗🌠🏆💝☺

Was a great game, I learned a ton of geography. But now the ads are seriously out of control. Top players are really the ones who watch the most ads. Also, it would be nice if the encyclopedia allowed you to compare countries for a given category instead of only being able to view a single country.

Excellent and really informative game. As someone who loves geography I learned a lot of new things. However I have just one problem to adress. Religion info on Bosnia and Herzegovina is incorrect and not updated, I've sent several reports but it is not fixed yet.
The graphics/fonts and everything are outdated, but there is SO much information you can be quizzed on. I'm learning everyday!

Probably the best geography quiz around. Has helped me alot because giving the wrong answer is never a setback. The game actually makes you correct your mistakes which is great. You can tell the developer loves geography.
description: World Geography is a quiz game that will help you learn everything about countries - maps, flags, capitals, population, religion, language, currency and much more. This quiz game will help you learn everything about geography in easy and enjoyable way.Features of World Geography - Quiz Game:● 6000 questions x 4 difficulties● Over 2000 different images● 400 different countries, regions and islands● Train your weaknesses after every game● Worldwide rankings, Encyclopedia26 different quiz options:● Find on Map● Capital City● Flag● Population● Border Outline● Religion● Emblem● Language● Currency● Highest Point Name● Highest Point● Area Size● Capital on Map● Capital Population● Head of State● Local Name● GDP Nominal● GDP PPP per Capita● Median Age● Life Expectancy● Religion in %● Population Density● Arable Land● School Expectancy● Fertility● Country MottoWorld Geography - Quiz Game is available in languages:● English● French● Spanish● Portuguese● German● Russian● Italian● Czech
descriptionHTML:
World Geography is a quiz game that will help you learn everything about countries - maps, flags, capitals, population, religion, language, currency and much more. This quiz game will help you learn everything about geography in easy and enjoyable way.

Features of World Geography - Quiz Game:
● 6000 questions x 4 difficulties
● Over 2000 different images
● 400 different countries, regions and islands
● Train your weaknesses after every game
● Worldwide rankings, Encyclopedia
